original: Aggaṇhanavasenāti taṇhāgāhena aggahaṇavasena. Yattha hi taṇhāgāho vimocito, tattha

original: Idameva upādiyatīti niyamābhāvato “aṭṭhārasavidhampī”ti vuttaṃ. Sesapadepi eseva

original: Se āyatane veditabbeti nirodhassa kāraṇaṃ nibbānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ āyatanānanti cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ āyatanānaṃ. Paṭikkhepena nibbānaṃ dassitaṃ veneyyajjhāsayavasena.

original: 48. Taṃ panetanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ paccāmasati. Vāre atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena pattepi. Dvīhīti yasmiṃ āvāse vivādādhikaraṇaṃ uppannaṃ, tattha vāsīhi dvīhipi bhikkhūhi atirekatarā.

original: 49. Khandhasāmantanti āpattikkhandhabhāvena samīpaṃ. Āpattisāmantaṃ nāma pubbabhāgā

original: 9. Mahāpuṇṇamasuttavaṇṇanā

analyzed: tasmin ahu uti tasmim ahani iti āha tasmin divase iti anasanena ati sabbaso āhārassa

original: abhuñjanena sāsanikasīlena bāhirakaanasanena upetā hutvāti yojanā. Vā-saddena khīrapānamadhusāyanādividhiṃ
analyzed: upetāḥ hutvā ati yojanāḥ khīra pāna madhu sāyana ādi vidhim

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Upecca vasitabbato uposatho, pātimokkhuddeso. Upetena samannāgatena hutvā
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti upecca vasitabbataḥ uposathaḥ pātimokkha uddeso upetena samannāgatena hutvā

original: vasitabbato santāne vāsetabbato uposatho, sīlaṃ. Anasanādidhammādiṃ vā upecca vasanaṃ
analyzed: vasitabbataḥ santāne vāsetabbataḥ uposathaḥ sīlam an asana ādi dhamma ādim vā upecca vasanam

original: upavāso uposatho. Tathārūpe hatthijātivisese uposathoti samaññāmattanti āha – “uposatho
analyzed: upavāso uposatho tathārūpe hatthi jāti visese uposatho ti samaññā mattam ti āha uposatho

original: nāma nāgarājātiādīsu paññattī”ti. Vuttanayena upavasanti etthāti uposatho, divaso.
analyzed: nāma nāga rājā āti ādīsu paññatti iti vutta nayena upavasanti ettha ati uposathaḥ divasaḥ

original: So panesa uposatho. Māsapuṇṇatāyāti māsassa pūritabhāvena. Sampuṇṇāti sabbaso puṇṇā.
analyzed: saḥ pana esaḥ uposathaḥ māsa puṇṇa tāya ati māsassa pūrita bhāvena sampuṇṇā ati sabbaso puṇṇā

original: Tāya hi rattiyā vasena māso anavasesato puṇṇo hoti. Māsaddhamāsādibhedaṃ kālaṃ māti
analyzed: tāya hi rattiyāḥ vasena māsaḥ anavasesataḥ puṇṇaḥ hoti māsaddha māsa ādi bhedam kālam māti

original: minanto viya hotīti ca “mā”iti cando vuccati. Etthāti etissā rattiyā. Puṇṇo paripuṇṇakalo
analyzed: minantaḥ viya hoti iti ca mā iti candaḥ vuccati ettha ati etissā rattiyā puṇṇaḥ paripuṇṇa kalo

original: jātoti puṇṇamā. Tañhi candapāripūriyā māsapāripūriyā evamāha. Etena tassa uposathabhāvaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: jātaḥ iti puṇṇamā tat hi canda pāripūriyā māsa pāripūriyā evam āha etena tassa uposatha bhāvam dasseti

original: Dissati phalaṃ sandissatīti deso, hetūti āha “desanti kāraṇa”nti. Sabbaṃ kathenti
analyzed: dissati phalam sandissati iti desaḥ hetu iti āha desanti kāraṇanti sabbam kathenti

original: sabbaṃ attanā pariggahitappakāraṃ kathenti. Kathetuṃ na sakkonti avisayattā. Pāsādapariveṇeti
analyzed: sabbam attanā pariggahita ppakāram kathenti kathetum na sakkonti a visaya ttā pāsāda pariveṇā iti

original: pāsādassa purato vivaṭaṅgaṇe. Heṭṭhā vuttanayenāti sekhasutte vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ.
analyzed: pāsādassa puratas vivaṭaṅgaṇe heṭṭhā vutta nayena ati sekha sutte vutta nayena vitthāretabbam

original: 86. Ime nu khoti ettha nūti saṃsayajotanoti āha – “vimatipucchā viya kathitā”ti.
analyzed: ime nu kho iti ettha nu iti āha vimati pucchā kathitā ati

original: Jānantenātiādi pucchāvattadassanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na pucchakassa satthu attano ajānanabhāvadīpanaparaṃ.
analyzed: jānantena ati ādi pucchāvatta dassana param daṭṭhabbam na pucchakassa satthu attanaḥ a jānana bhāva dīpana param

original: Jānāti hi bhagavā. Ajānantena viya hutvā pucchite. Yathābhūtasabhāvaṃ jānanto viya
analyzed: jānāti hi bhagavā a jānantena hutvā pucchite yathā bhūta sabhāvam jānantaḥ

original: pucchati kohaññe ṭhatvā. Tenāha – “thero evarūpaṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ karissatī”ti kāraṇassa
analyzed: pucchati kohaññe tena āha theraḥ evarūpam vacanam kim karissati iti kāraṇassa

original: suppahīnattāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: su ppahīna ttā ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Chandamūlakāti taṇhāchandamūlakā. Taṇhā hi dukkhasamudayo. Kusalasañño vā thiravisadanipuṇasañño
analyzed: chanda mūlakā ati taṇhā a chanda mūlakā taṇhā hi dukkha samudayo kusala saññaḥ vā thira visada nipuṇa sañño

original: vā, kusalasaṅkhāro vā tikhiṇathiravisadasaṅkhāro vā; suvisuddhavipulodāraviññāṇo
analyzed: vā kusala saṅkhāraḥ vā tikhiṇa thira visada saṅkhāraḥ vā su visuddha vipula udāra viññāṇaḥ

original: vāti imamatthaṃ “saññādīsupi eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati. Kasmā panettha anāgatakālavaseneva
analyzed: vā ti imam attham saññā ādīsu pi esā iva nayo ti iminā atidisati kasmā pana ittha anāgata kāla vasena iva

original: desanā āgatāti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
analyzed: desanā āgatā ati āha

original: Khandhānaṃ khandhapaṇṇattīti khandhasaddābhidheyyānaṃ ruppanānubhavanasañjānanābhisaṅkharavijānanasabhāvānaṃ
analyzed: khandhānam khandha paṇṇatti iti khandha sadda abhidheyyānam ruppana anubhavana sañjānana abhisaṅkhara vijānana sabhāvānam

original: atthānaṃ “khandho”ti ayaṃ samaññā. Kittakenāti kiṃparimāṇena atthena, rāsatthabhāgatthādīsu
analyzed: atthānam khandho ti ayam samaññā kittakena ati kiṃparimāṇena atthena rāsattha bhāgattha ādīsu

original: kīdisenāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: kīdisena ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Hetuhetūti hetupaccayabhūto hetu. Yo hi lobhādīnaṃ sahajātadhammesu mūlaṭṭhenupakārakabhāvo
analyzed: hetu hetū ti hetu paccaya bhūtaḥ hetu yaḥ hi lobha ādīnam sahajāta dhammesu mūlaṭṭhena upakāraka bhāvaḥ

original: nippariyāyena hetuttho; so pathavīādīsupi paccayabhāvamattena hetupariyāyadassanato
analyzed: nippariyāyena hetu tthaḥ so pathavī ādīsu pi paccaya bhāva mattena hetu pariyāya dassanato

original: dutiyena hetu-saddena visesetvā vutto “hetuhetū”ti. Avijjā puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ
analyzed: dutiyena hetu saddena visesetvā vuttaḥ hetu hetū ti avijjā puñña abhisaṅkhāra ādīnam

original: sādhāraṇapaccayattā sādhāraṇahetu, “atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso
analyzed: sādhāraṇa paccaya ttā sādhāraṇa hetu atīta anāgata paccuppannānam kamma samādānānam ṭhānaso

original: hetuso vipāka”nti ettha vijjamānesupi aññesu paccayesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākaniyāmakattā
analyzed: hetuso vipākanti ettha vijjamānesu pi aññesu paccayesu iṭṭha aniṭṭha vipāka niyāmaka ttā

original: kammaṃ tassa padhānakāraṇanti āha – “kusalākusalaṃ attano attano vipākadāne uttamahetū”ti.
analyzed: kammam tassa padhāna kāraṇanti āha kusala akusalam attanaḥ attanaḥ vipāka dāne uttama hetū ti

original: “Mahābhūtā hetū”ti ayamevattho “mahābhūtā paccayo”ti imināpi vuttoti hetusaddapaccayasaddānaṃ
analyzed: mahābhūtā hetū ti ayam eva atthaḥ mahābhūtā paccayo ti iminā api vuttaḥ ti hetu sadda paccaya saddānam

original: samānatthattā paccayo eva hetu paccayahetu, yo ca rūpakkhandhassa hetu, so eva tassa
analyzed: samāna attha ttā paccayaḥ eva hetu paccaya hetu yaḥ ca rūpa kkhandhassa hetu saḥ eva tassa

original: paññāpanāya paccayoti vuttoti āha – “idha paccayahetu adhippeto”ti. Yadaggena paccayadhammo
analyzed: paññāpanāya paccayaḥ ti vuttaḥ ti āha idha paccaya hetu adhippeto ti yad aggena paccaya dhammo

original: attano paccayuppannassa uppādāya ṭhitiyā ca paccayo, tadaggena tassa bhāvato samaññāto
analyzed: attano paccaya uppannassa uppādāya ṭhitiyā ca paccayaḥ tad aggena tassa bhāvataḥ samaññāto

original: paññāpanāyapi so paccayoti vattabbataṃ arahatīti. Pāḷiyaṃ avibhāgena vuttamatthaṃ
analyzed: so paccayaḥ ti vattabba tam arahati iti avibhāgena vuttam attham

original: vibhāgena dassetuṃ, “tattha pathavīdhātū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paññāpanāyāti sahetuahetukantiādiākārehi
analyzed: vibhāgena dassetum tattha pathavī dhātu utiādi vuttam tattha paññāpanāya ati sa hetu ahetukam ti ādi ākārehi

original: bodhanāya. Taṃ pana sabbodhanaṃ ñāṇena dassanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “dassanatthāyā”ti.
analyzed: bodhanāya tam pana sa bodhanam ñāṇena dassanam hoti iti vuttam dassana atthāya ati

original: Phassoti phassasamaṅgībhāvo. So cettha sakiccanipphādanasamatthassa phassassa nibbatti.
analyzed: phassaḥ ti phassa samaṅgībhāvaḥ saḥ ca ittha sa kicca nipphādana samatthassa phassassa nibbatti

original: Nibbatto hi phasso tathārūpāya vedanāya paccayo hotīti. Etadatthamevettha bhagavatā
analyzed: nibbattaḥ hi phassaḥ tathārūpāya vedanāya paccayaḥ hoti iti etad attham eva ittha bhagavatā

original: puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā, tasmā paccuppannātītakālavasena dvikāliko phassasaddo
analyzed: puggala adhiṭṭhānā desanā katā tasmā paccuppanna atīta kāla vasena dvikāliko phassa saddo

original: veditabbo. Phasse sati vedeti phassapaccayā vedanāicceva vuttaṃ hoti. Sesapadadvayepi
analyzed: veditabbaḥ phasse sati vede ti phassa paccayā vedanā icca iva vuttam hoti sesa pada dvaye pi

original: eseva nayo. Yatheva hi vedanāya evaṃ saññāya saṅkhārānampi phasso visesapaccayo tasmiṃ
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ yathā iva hi vedanāya evam saññāya saṅkhārānam pi phassaḥ visesa paccayaḥ tasmin

original: asati abhāvato. Cetanāggahaṇena āyūhanānurūpatāya tappadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhadhammā
analyzed: asati abhāvataḥ cetanā ggahaṇena āyūhana anurūpa tāya tad padhāna ttā saṅkhāra kkhandha dhammā

original: gahitā. Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhabhājanīye ca “cakkhusamphassajā
analyzed: gahitā tathā hi suttanta bhājanīye saṅkhāra kkhandha bhājanīye ca cakkhu samphassa jā

original: cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva niddiṭṭhā. Viññāṇakkhandhassāti ettha ekasmiṃ bhave ādibhūtaviññāṇassa
analyzed: cetanā ati ādinā cetanā ava niddiṭṭhā viññāṇa kkhandhassa ati ettha ekasmin bhave ādi bhūta viññāṇassa

original: nāmarūpapaccayataṃ dassetuṃ, “paṭisandhiviññāṇena tāvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha gabbhaseyyakassa
analyzed: nāma rūpa paccaya tam dassetum paṭisandhi viññāṇena tāva ātiādi vuttam tattha gabbhaseyyakassa

original: sabhāvakassa rūpapavattiṃ sandhāya “uparimaparicchedenā”ti vuttaṃ samatiṃsato upari
analyzed: sabhāvakassa rūpa pavattim sandhāya uparima paricchedena ati vuttam samatiṃsataḥ upari

original: paṭisandhikkhaṇe tassa rūpānaṃ asambhavato. Idāni pavattiviññāṇassa nāmarūpapaccayaṃ
analyzed: paṭisandhi khaṇe tassa rūpānaṃ asambhavato idāni pavatti viññāṇassa nāma rūpa paccayam

original: dvāravasena dassetuṃ, “cakkhudvāre”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nanu ca viññāṇassapi phasso paccayo,
analyzed: dvāra vasena dassetum cakkhu dvāra itiādi vuttam nanu ca viññāṇassa api phassaḥ paccayaḥ

original: kasmā tayo eva khandhā phassapaccayā vuttāti? Saccametaṃ, yathā pana viññāṇasahito
analyzed: kasmā tayo eva khandhā phassa paccayāḥ vuttā ati saccam etam yathā pana viññāṇa sahitaḥ

original: phasso vedanādīnaṃ paccayo, na evaṃ viññāṇassa. Tenāha bhagavā – “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati
analyzed: phassaḥ vedanā ādīnam paccayaḥ na evam viññāṇassa tena āha bhagavā

original: phasso”ti phasso viya nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa visesapaccayo yathā nāmarūpapaccayāpi
analyzed: phassaḥ ti phassaḥ viya nāma rūpam viññāṇassa visesa paccayaḥ yathā nāma rūpa paccayā api

original: viññāṇanti. Tasmā imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ nāmarūpasseva viññāṇapaccayatā vuttā, na phassassa.
analyzed: viññāṇanti tasmai imam visesam dassetum nāma rūpassa iva viññāṇa paccaya tā vuttā na phassassa

original: 87. Yāva sakkāyadiṭṭhi samuppajjati, tāva vaṭṭassa pariyanto natthevāti appahīnasakkāyadiṭṭhiko
analyzed: yāva sakkāya diṭṭhi samuppajjati tāva vaṭṭassa pariyantaḥ nattha eva ati appahīna sakkāya diṭṭhiko

original: vaṭṭe paribbhamatīti āha – “kathaṃ pana, bhanteti vaṭṭaṃ pucchanto”ti. Yathā ca sakkāyadiṭṭhijotanā
analyzed: vaṭṭe paribbhamati iti āha katham pana bhante iti vaṭṭam pucchanto iti yathā ca sakkāya diṭṭhi jotanā

original: vaṭṭapucchā, evaṃ tabbhedanajotanā vivaṭṭapucchāti āha – “sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotīti
analyzed: vaṭṭapucchā evam tad bhedana jotanā vivaṭṭapucchā ati āha sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hoti iti

original: vivaṭṭaṃ pucchanto”ti.
analyzed: vivaṭṭam pucchanto ti

original: 88. Ayaṃ rūpe assādoti yāthāvato dassanaṃ pariññābhisamayo, dukkhasaccapariyāpannañca
analyzed: ayam rūpe assādaḥ ti yāthāvataḥ dassanam pariññā abhisamayaḥ dukkha sacca pariyāpannam ca

original: rūpanti āha – “iminā pariññāpaṭivedho ceva dukkhasaccañca kathita”nti. “Yaṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: rūpam ti āha iminā pariññā paṭivedho ca iva dukkha saccam ca kathitan ti yam rūpam

original: anicca”ntiādivacanato aniccādibhāvo tattha ādīnavo, so cassa paccayādhīnavuttitāya
analyzed: anicca nti ādi vacanataḥ anicca ādi bhāvaḥ tattha ādīnavaḥ so ca ssa paccaya adhīna vutti tāya

original: paccayo samudayasaccanti samudayappahānena ādīnavasamatikkamoti ādīnavaggahaṇena
analyzed: paccayo samudaya saccanti samudaya ppahānena ādīnava samatikkamo ti ādīnava ggahaṇena

original: siddhamatthamāha – “pahānapaṭivedho ceva samudayasaccañcā”ti. Sabbasaṅkhatanissaraṇaṃ
analyzed: siddham attham āha pahāna paṭivedho ca iva samudaya saccam ca ati sabba saṅkhata nissaraṇam

original: nibbānañca sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena paṭivijjhitabbanti āha – “iminā sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho
analyzed: nibbānam ca sacchikiriyā abhisamaya vasena paṭivijjhitabbanti āha iminā sacchikiriyā paṭivedhaḥ

original: ceva nirodhasaccañcā”ti. Imesu tīsu ṭhānesūti yathāvuttesu dukkhādīsu tīsu abhisamayaṭṭhānesu.
analyzed: ca iva nirodha saccam ca ati imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uti yathā vuttesu dukkha ādīsu tīsu abhisamayaṭṭhānesu

original: Ye sammādiṭṭhiādayo dhammāti ye ariyamaggasaññitā sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha, satta vā
analyzed: ye sammādiṭṭhi ādayaḥ dhammā ati ye ariya magga saññitā sammādiṭṭhi ādayaḥ aṭṭha satta vā

original: dhammā. Bhāvanāpaṭivedho maggasaccanti bhāvanābhisamayavasena pavattaṃ maggasaccaṃ.
analyzed: dhammā bhāvanā paṭivedhaḥ magga saccanti bhāvanā abhisamaya vasena pavattam magga saccaṃ

original: Sesapadesupīti, “ayaṃ vedanāya assādo”tiādipadesupi.
analyzed: sesa padesu pi iti ayam vedanāya

original: 89. Imasminti āsannapaccakkhatāya sakaattabhāvo gahito, tadeva ajjhattā khandhāti
analyzed: imasmin ti āsanna paccakkha tāya sakaatta bhāvaḥ gahitaḥ tat eva ajjhattā khandhā ti

original: tappaṭiyogitāya, “bahiddhāti parassa saviññāṇake kāye”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbanimittesūti
analyzed: tad paṭiyogi tāya bahiddhā ti parassa sa viññāṇake kāye iti vuttam sabba nimittesu

original: sabbesu rūpanimittādīsupi. Tāni pana indriyabaddhānipi anindriyabaddhānipi taṃsabhāvānīti
analyzed: sabbesu rūpa nimitta ādīsu pi tāni pana indriya baddhāni api anindriya baddhāni api taṃsa bhāvāni iti

original: āha “anindriyabaddhampi saṅgaṇhātī”ti. Viññāṇaggahaṇenevettha vedanādayopi gahitā
analyzed: āha anindriya baddham pi saṅgaṇhāti iti viññāṇa ggahaṇena iva itthā vedanā ādayaḥ api gahitā

original: avinābhāvatoti, “saviññāṇake kāye”ti vuttaṃ. “Kāyo”ti vā khandhasamūhoti attho.
analyzed: avinābhāvato ti saviññāṇake kāya iti vuttam kāyaḥ ti vā khandha samūhaḥ ti attho

original: 90. Anattani ṭhatvāti attarahite anattasabhāve khandhakoṭṭhāse ṭhatvā taṃ ādhāraṃ
analyzed: ṭhatvā ati atta rahite an atta sabhāve khandha koṭṭhāse ṭhatvā tam ādhāram

original: katvā katāni kammāni. Katarasmiṃ attani ṭhatvāti kīdise attani nissayavipākaṃ dassanti
analyzed: katvā katāni kammāni katarasmin attani ṭhatvā ati kīdise attani nissaya vipākam dassanti

original: vipaccissanti. Etena kārakavedakarahitattā attapakkhakammakāni na yujjantīti dasseti,
analyzed: vipaccissanti etena kāraka vedaka rahita ttā atta pakkha kammakāni na yujjanti iti dasseti

original: khandhānaṃ khaṇikattā ca katanāsaakatabbhāgamadoso ca āpajjatīti.
analyzed: khandhānam khaṇika ttā ca ca āpajjati iti

original: Tatrāyaṃ codanāsodhanāvidhi – pāṇātipātavasena tāva kammapathasambandhavibhāvanā,
analyzed: tatra ayam codanā sodhanā vidhi pāṇa atipāta vasena kamma patha sambandha vibhāvanā

original: khaṇe khaṇe hi nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hanti, ko vā haññati, yadi cittacetasikasantāno,
analyzed: khaṇe khaṇe hi nirujjhana sabhāvesu saṅkhāresu kaḥ hanti kaḥ vā haññati yadi citta cetasika santānaḥ

original: so arūpattā na chedanabhedanādivasena vikopanasamattho, napi vikopanīyo. Atha rūpasantāno,
analyzed: saḥ arūpattā na chedana bhedana ādi vasena vikopana samatthaḥ atha rūpa santānaḥ

original: so acetanattā kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā pāṇātipātāpuññaṃ pasavati
analyzed: so acetana ttā kaṭṭhaka liṅga rūpamaḥ ti na tattha chedana ādinā pāṇa atipāta apuññam pasavati

original: yathā matasarīre. Payogopi pāṇātipātassa paharaṇappahārādiko atītesu vā saṅkhāresu
analyzed: yathā mata sarīre payogaḥ api pāṇātipātassa paharaṇa pahāra ādikaḥ atītesu vā saṅkhāresu

original: bhaveyya, anāgatesu, paccuppannesu vā, tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu sambhavati tesaṃ
analyzed: anāgatesu paccuppannesu vā tattha na tāva atīta anāgatesu sambhavati tesam

original: idha padasaddo, tasmā anupadaṃ anukkamenāti ayamettha atthoti āha “anupaṭipāṭiyā”ti.
analyzed: idha pada saddo tasmai anupadam anukkamena ati ayam ettha attho ti āha anupaṭipāṭiyā iti

original: Dhammavipassananti taṃtaṃsamāpatticittuppādapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipassanaṃ.
analyzed: dhamma vipassanam ti tad tad samāpatti cittuppāda pariyāpannānam dhammānam vipassanam

original: Vipassatīti samāpattiyo jhānamukhena te te dhamme yāthāvato pariggahetvā, “itipi
analyzed: vipassati iti samāpattiyaḥ jhāna mukhena te te dhamme yāthāvato pariggahetvā iti pi

original: dukkhā”tiādinā sammasati. Addhamāsena arahattaṃ patto ukkaṃsagatassa sāvakānaṃ sammasanacārassa
analyzed: dukkha ati ādinā sammasati addha māsena arahattam pattaḥ ukkaṃsa gatassa sāvakānam sammasana cārassa

original: nippadesena pavattiyamānattā, sāvakapāramīñāṇassa ca tathā paṭipādetabbattā. Evaṃ
analyzed: nippadesena pavattiyamāna ttā sāvaka pāramī ñāṇassa ca tathā paṭipādetabba ttā evam

original: santepīti yadipi mahāmoggallānatthero na cirasseva arahattaṃ patto; dhammasenāpati
analyzed: sante pi iti yadi pi mahāmoggallāna theraḥ na cirassa iva arahattam pattaḥ dhamma senāpati

original: pana tato cirena, evaṃ santepi yasmā moggallānattheropi mahāpaññova, tasmā sāriputtattherova
analyzed: pana tato cirena evam sante pi yasmā moggallāna ttheraḥ api mahā paññā uva tasmā sāriputta ttheraḥ uva

original: mahāpaññataroti. Idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ, “mahāmoggallānatthero hī”tiādi
analyzed: mahā paññataraḥ ti idāni tam attham pākaṭataram kātum mahā moggallāna ttheraḥ hi itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Sammasanaṃ carati etthāti sammasanacāro, vipassanābhūmi, taṃ sammasanacāraṃ.
analyzed: vuttam sammasanam carati ettha ati sammasana cāraḥ vipassanā bhūmi tam sammasana cāram

original: Ekadesamevāti sakaattabhāve saṅkhāre anavasesato pariggahetuñca sammasituñca asakkontaṃ
analyzed: eka desam eva ati saka atta bhāve saṅkhāre anavasesato pariggahetum ca sammasitum ca a sakkontam

original: attano abhinīhārasamudāgatañāṇabalānurūpaṃ ekadesameva pariggahetvā sammasanto. Nanu
analyzed: attanaḥ abhinīhāra samudāgata ñāṇa bala anurūpam eka desam eva pariggahetvā sammasantaḥ nanu

original: ca “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti
analyzed: ca sabbam bhikkhave an abhijānam a parijānam a virājayam a pajaham abhabbaḥ dukkha kkhayāya ati

original: vacanato vaṭṭadukkhato muccitukāmena sabbaṃ pariññeyyaṃ parijānitabbameva? Saccametaṃ,
analyzed: vacanataḥ vaṭṭa dukkhataḥ muccitu kāmena sabbam pariññeyyam parijānitabbam eva saccam etam

original: tañca kho sammasanupagadhammavasena vuttaṃ. Tasmā sasantānagate sabbadhamme, parasantānagate
analyzed: tat ca kho sammasanupaga dhamma vasena vuttam tasmā sa santāna gate sabba dhamme para santāna gate

original: ca tesaṃ santānavibhāgaṃ akatvā bahiddhābhāvasāmaññato sammasanaṃ, ayaṃ sāvakānaṃ
analyzed: ca tesam santāna vibhāgam a katvā bahiddhā bhāva sāmaññato sammasanam ayam sāvakānam

original: sammasanacāro. Thero pana bahiddhādhammepi santānavibhāgena keci keci uddharitvā
analyzed: sammasanacāraḥ theraḥ pana bahiddhā dhamme pi santāna vibhāgena keci keci uddharitvā

original: sammasi, tañca kho ñāṇena phuṭṭhamattaṃ katvā. Tena vuttaṃ – “yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento
analyzed: sammasi tat ca kho ñāṇena phuṭṭha mattam katvā tena vuttam yaṭṭhi koṭiyā uppīḍento

original: viya ekadesameva sammasanto”ti. Tattha ñāṇena nāma yāvatā neyyaṃ pavattitabbaṃ, tathā
analyzed: viya eka desam eva sammasanto ti tattha ñāṇena nāma yāvatā pavattitabbam tathā

original: apavattanato “yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Anupadadhammavipassanāya
analyzed: apavattanataḥ yaṭṭhi koṭiyā uppīḷentaḥ viya iti ādi vuttam anupada dhamma vipassanāya

original: abhāvato “ekadesameva sammasanto”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: abhāvataḥ eka desam eva sammasanto ti vuttam

original: Buddhānaṃ sammasanacāro dasasahassilokadhātuyaṃ sattasantānagatā, anindriyabaddhā
analyzed: buddhānam sammasana cāraḥ satta santāna gatāḥ an indriya baddhāḥ

original: ca saṅkhārāti vadanti, koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesūti apare. Tathā hi addhattayavasena
analyzed: ca saṅkhārā iti vadanti koṭi sata sahassa cakkavāḷesu iti apare tathā hi addhattaya vasena

original: paṭiccasamuppādanayaṃ osaritvā chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena buddhānaṃ mahāvajirañāṇaṃ
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppāda nayam osaritvā chattiṃsa koṭi sata sahassa mukhena buddhānam mahā vajira ñāṇam

original: pavattaṃ. Paccekabuddhānaṃ sasantānagatehi saddhiṃ majjhimadesavāsisattasantānagatā
analyzed: pavattam paccekabuddhānam sa santāna gatehi saddhim majjhima desa vāsi satta santāna gatā

original: anindriyabaddhā ca sammasanacāroti vadanti, jambudīpavāsisattasantānagatāti keci.
analyzed: an indriya baddhā ca sammasana cārā iti vadanti jambudīpa vāsi satta santāna gatā ati keci

original: Dhammasenāpatinopi yathāvuttasāvakānaṃ vipassanābhūmiyeva sammasanacāro. Tattha pana
analyzed: dhammasenāpatino pi yathā vutta sāvakānam vipassanā bhūmiyā iva sammasana cāro tattha pana

original: thero sātisayaṃ niravasesaṃ anupadadhammaṃ vipassi. Tena vuttaṃ – “sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ

original: nippadesaṃ sammasī”ti.
analyzed: nippadesam sammasi iti

original: Tattha “sāvakānaṃ vipassanābhūmī”ti ettha sukkhavipassakā lokiyābhiññappattā pakatisāvakā
analyzed: tattha sāvakānam vipassanā bhūmi iti ettha sukkha vipassakāḥ lokiya abhiñña ppattā pakati sāvakāḥ

original: aggasāvakā paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhāti chasu janesu sukkhavipassakānaṃ jhānābhiññāhi
analyzed: aggasāvakā paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhā ati chasu janesu sukkha vipassakānam jhāna abhiññāhi

original: anadhigatapaññānepuññattā andhānaṃ viya icchitapadesokkamanaṃ vipassanākāle icchikicchitadhammavipassanā

original: natthi. Te yathāpariggahitadhammamatteyeva ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhenti. Lokiyābhiññappattā
analyzed: natthi te yathā pariggahita dhamma mattā iva ṭhatvā vipassanam vaḍḍhenti lokiya abhiñña ppattā

original: pana pakatisāvakā yena mukhena vipassanaṃ ārabhanti; tato aññena vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ
analyzed: pana pakati sāvakāḥ yena mukhena vipassanam ārabhanti tatas aññena vipassanam vitthārikam

original: kātuṃ sakkonti vipulañāṇattā. Mahāsāvakā abhinīhārasampannattā tato sātisayaṃ vipassanaṃ
analyzed: kātum sakkonti vipula ñāṇa ttāḥ mahāsāvakāḥ abhinīhāra sampanna ttā tatas sa atisayam vipassanam

original: sātisayattā vipassanaṃ tatopi vitthārikaṃ karoti. Paṭhamo pana tato mahāpaññatāya
analyzed: sa ati saya ttā vipassanam tatas pi vitthārikam karoti paṭhamaḥ pana tatas mahā pañña tāya

original: sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ vitthārikaṃ karoti. Paccekabuddho tehipi mahābhinīhāratāya attano
analyzed: sāvakehi asādhāraṇam vitthārikam karoti paccekabuddhaḥ tehi pi mahā abhinīhāra tāya attano

analyzed: abhinīhāra anurūpam tatas pi vitthārika vipassanam karonti buddhānam sammat eva paripūrita paññāpāramipa bhāvita sabbaññuta ññāṇa adhigamanassa

original: anurūpāyāti. Yathā nāma katavālavedhaparicayena sarabhaṅgasadisena dhanuggahena khitto
analyzed: anurūpāya ati yathā nāma kata vālavedha paricayena sarabhaṅga sadisena dhanuggahena khittaḥ

original: saro antarā rukkhalatādīsu asajjamāno lakkhaṇeyeva patati; na sajjati na virajjhati,
analyzed: saraḥ antarā rukkha latā ādīsu a sajjamānaḥ lakkhaṇeya iva patati na sajjati na virajjhati

original: evaṃ antarā asajjamānā avirajjhamānā vipassanā sammasanīyadhammesu yāthāvato nānānayehi
analyzed: evam antarā a sajjamānā a virajjhamānā vipassanā sammasanīya dhammesu yāthāvataḥ nānā nayehi

original: pavattati. Yaṃ mahāñāṇanti vuccati, tassa pavattiākārabhedo gaṇato vuttoyeva.
analyzed: pavattati yam mahāñāṇan ti vuccati tassa pavatti ākāra bhedaḥ gaṇataḥ vuttaḥ yeva

original: Etesu ca sukkhavipassakānaṃ vipassanācāro khajjotapabhāsadiso, abhiññappattapakatisāvakānaṃ

analyzed: dīpa pabhā sadisaḥ mahāsāvakānam okkā pabhā sadisaḥ agga sāvakānam osadhi tārakā pabhā sadisaḥ

original: paccekabuddhānaṃ candapabhāsadiso, sammāsambuddhānaṃ rasmisahassapaṭimaṇḍitasaradasūriyamaṇḍalasadiso
analyzed: paccekabuddhānam canda pabhā sadisaḥ sammāsambuddhānam rasmi sahassa paṭimaṇḍita sarada sūriya maṇḍala sadisaḥ

analyzed: upaṭṭhāsi tathā sukkha vipassakānam vipassanā ācāraḥ andhānam yaṭṭhi koṭiyāḥ gamana sadisaḥ

analyzed: lokiya abhiñña ppatta pakati sāvakānam daṇḍaka setu gamana sadisaḥ mahāsāvakānam jaṅgha setu gamana sadisaḥ

original: sammāsambuddhānaṃ mahāsakamaggagamanasadisoti veditabbo.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhānam mahā saka magga gamana sadisaḥ ti veditabbaḥ

original: Arahattañca kira patvāti ettha kira-saddo anussavaladdhoyamatthoti dīpetuṃ vutto.
analyzed: arahattam ca kira patvā iti ettha kira saddaḥ anussava laddhaḥ yam atthaḥ ti dīpetum vuttaḥ

original: Patvā aññāsi attano vipassanācārassa mahāvisayattā tikkhavisadasūrabhāvassa ca sallakkhaṇena.
analyzed: patvā aññāsi attanaḥ vipassanā ācārassa mahā visaya ttā tikkha visada sūra bhāvassa ca sat lakkhaṇena

original: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ mahāthero dandhaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇanto sīghaṃ arahattaṃ pattato paññāya
analyzed: katham pana ayam mahā theraḥ dandham arahattam pāpuṇantaḥ sīgham arahattam pattataḥ paññāya

original: attānaṃ sātisayaṃ katvā aññāsīti āha – “yathā hī”tiādi. Mahājaṭanti mahājālasākhaṃ

original: ativiya sibbitajālaṃ. Yaṭṭhiṃ pana sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhati veṇuggahaṇe anuccinitvā

original: veḷuyaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, eko uccinitvā, evaṃ nipphattikaṃ. Padhānanti bhāvanānuyuñjanaṃ.

original: Sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇānīti paṭisambhidāmagge āgatesu tesattatiyā ñāṇesu ṭhapetvā cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni

original: sutamayañāṇādīni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāñāṇapariyosānāni sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇāni. Tāni hi
analyzed: suta maya ñāṇa ādīni paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā ñāṇa pariyosānāni sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇāni tāni hi

analyzed: sāvakehi pavicitabbāni na itarāni soḷasavidham paññanti mahāpaññā ādikā navā anupubba vihāra samāpatti paññā ati

original: idaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ paññaṃ.
analyzed: idam soḷasavidham paññam

original: Tatrāti tassa. Idaṃ hotīti idaṃ dāni vuccamānaṃ anupubbasammasanaṃ hoti. Vipassanākoṭṭhāsanti vitakkādisammasitabbadhammavibhāgena vibhattavipassanābhāgaṃ.
analyzed: tatra ati tassa idam hoti iti idam dāni vuccamānam anupubba sammasanam hoti vipassanā koṭṭhāsanti vitakka ādi sammasitabba dhamma vibhāgena vibhatta vipassanā bhāgam

original: 94. Paṭhame jhāneti upasilese bhummaṃ, tasmā ye paṭhame jhāne dhammāti ye paṭhamajjhānasaṃsaṭṭhā
analyzed: paṭhame jhāne iti upasilese bhummam tasmā ye paṭhame jhāne dhammā ati ye paṭhama jhāna saṃsaṭṭhā

original: dhammāti attho. Antosamāpattiyanti ca samāpattisahagate cittuppāde samāpattisamaññaṃ
analyzed: dhammā ati atthaḥ antosamāpattiyanti ca samāpatti sahagate cittuppāde samāpatti samaññam

original: āropetvā vuttaṃ. Vavatthitāti katavavatthanā nicchitā. Paricchinnāti ñāṇena paricchinnā
analyzed: āropetvā vuttam vavatthitā ati kata vavatthanā nicchitā paricchinnā ati ñāṇena paricchinnā

original: salakkhaṇato paricchijja ñātā. Olokentoti ñāṇacakkhunā paccakkhato passanto. Abhiniropanaṃ
analyzed: sa lakkhaṇato paricchijja ñātāḥ olokento ti ñāṇa cakkhunā paccakkhataḥ passantaḥ abhiniropanam

original: ārammaṇe cittassa āropanaṃ. Anumajjanaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa anuvicāraṇaṃ. Pharaṇaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇe cittassa āropanaṃ anumajjanaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa anuvicāraṇam pharaṇam

original: paṇītarūpehi kāyassa byāpanaṃ, vipphārikabhāvo vā. Sātanti sātamadhuratā. Adhikkhepo
analyzed: paṇīta rūpehi kāyassa byāpanam vipphārika bhāvaḥ vā sāta nti sāta madhura tā adhikkhepaḥ

original: vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ samādhānaṃ. Phusanaṃ indriyavisayaviññāṇassa tato uppajjitvā
analyzed: vikkhepassa paṭipakkha bhūtam samādhānam phusanam indriya visaya viññāṇassa tatas uppajjitvā

original: ārammaṇe phusanākārena viya pavatti. Vedayitaṃ ārammaṇānubhavanaṃ. Sañjānanaṃ nīlādivasena
analyzed: ārammaṇe phusana ākārena viya pavatti vedayitam ārammaṇa anubhavanam sañjānanam nīla ādi vasena

original: ārammaṇassa sallakkhaṇaṃ. Cetayitaṃ cetaso byāpāro. Vijānanaṃ ārammaṇūpaladdhi. Kattukamyatā
analyzed: ārammaṇassa sat lakkhaṇam cetayitam cetasaḥ byāpāraḥ vijānanam ārammaṇa upaladdhi kattu kamya tā

original: cittassa ārammaṇena atthikatā. Tasmiṃ ārammaṇe adhimuccanaṃ, sanniṭṭhānaṃ vā adhimokkho.
analyzed: cittassa ārammaṇena atthika tā tasmin ārammaṇe adhimuccanam sanniṭṭhānam vā adhimokkho

original: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā cittassa paggaṇhanaṃ paggāho, adhiggahoti attho. Ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: kosajja pakkhe patitum a datvā cittassa paggaṇhanam paggāhaḥ adhiggaho ti atthaḥ ārammaṇam

original: upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ. Samappavattesu assesu sārathi viya
analyzed: upagantvā ṭhānam a nissajjanam vā upaṭṭhānam sama pavattesu assesu sārathi viya

original: sakiccapasutesu sampayuttesu ajjhupekkhanaṃ majjhattatā. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe
analyzed: sa kicca pasutesu sampayuttesu ajjhupekkhanam majjhatta tā sampayutta dhammānam ārammaṇe

original: anunayanaṃ saṃcaraṇaṃ anunayo. Sabhāvatoti yathābhūtasabhāvato. Soḷasannaṃ eva cettha
analyzed: anunayanam saṃcaraṇam anunayaḥ eva ca itthā

original: dhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ tesaṃyeva therena vavatthāpitabhāvato, te evassa tadā upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
analyzed: dhammānam gahaṇam tesam yeva therena vavatthāpita bhāvato te eva assa tadā upaṭṭhahiṃsu

original: na itareti vadanti. Vīriyasatiggahaṇena cettha indriyabhāvasāmaññato saddhāpaññā;
analyzed: na itarā iti vadanti vīriya sati gahaṇena ca ittha indriya bhāva sāmaññato saddhā paññā

original: satiggahaṇeneva ekantānavajjabhāvasāmaññato passaddhiādayo cha yugaḷā; alobhādosā
analyzed: sati ggahaṇena iva ekanta anavajja bhāva sāmaññato passaddhi ādayo cha yugaḷāḥ alobha adosā

original: ca saṅgahitā jhānacittuppādapariyāpannattā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ. Therena ca dhammā vavatthānasāmaññato
analyzed: ca saṅgahitāḥ jhāna cittuppāda pariyāpanna ttā tesam dhammānam therena ca dhammā vavatthāna sāmaññato

original: āraddhā. Te na upaṭṭhahiṃsūti na sakkā vattunti apare.
analyzed: āraddhā te na upaṭṭhahiṃsu iti na sakkā vattunti apare

original: Viditā uppajjantīti uppādepi nesaṃ vedanānaṃ pajānanaṃ hotiyevāti attho. Sesapadadvayepi

analyzed: niyyānika bhāva pavedana ttham ca iva sabrahmacārīnam sammāpaṭipattiyam ussāha janana ttham ca

original: 99. Dubbalanti pheggu viya subhejjanīyaṃ balavirahitaṃ, asāranti attho. Virāgutanti

original: assāsalesassapi abhāvato assāsavirahitaṃ. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena samannāgamanavasena
analyzed: assāsa lesassa api abhāvataḥ assāsa virahitam ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena samannāgamana vasena

original: daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhantīti upādānā. Adhitiṭṭhati cetaso abhinandanabhūtāti cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: daḷhaggāham gaṇhanti iti upādānā adhitiṭṭhati cetasaḥ abhinandana bhūtā ati cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhānam

original: Tāhīti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi. Tanti cittaṃ. Abhinivisatīti abhirativasena nivisati, ayañhettha
analyzed: tāhi iti taṇhā diṭṭhīhi cittam abhinivisati iti abhirati vasena nivisati ayam ha ittha

original: tiṭṭhati etāhi abhinivesāhi, tathā sakkāyadhammesu cittaṃ anuseti etāhīti anusayā,
analyzed: tiṭṭhati etāhi abhinivesāhi tathā sakkāya dhammesu cittam anuseti etāhi iti anusayā

original: “khayena virāgenā”ti hetumhi karaṇavasena attho vutto. Virāgenāti ca itisaddo ādi

original: attho. Tena “nirodhenā”ti evamādikaṃ gahitaṃ hoti. Aññamaññavevacanāneva upayādīnaṃ

original: samucchedasseva bodhanato.

original: patiṭṭhānadhātu. Nhānīyacuṇṇaṃ bāhiraudakaṃ viya sesabhūtattayaṃ ābandhatīti ābandhanaṃ.

original: Pacanīyabhattaṃ bāhiratejo viya sesabhūtattayaṃ paripācetīti paripācanaṃ. Bāhiravāto
analyzed: pacanīya bhattam bāhira tejaḥ sesa bhūtattayam paripāca iti iti paripācanam

analyzed: vitthambheti iti vitthambhanam dhātu saddatthaḥ vuttaḥ yā iva a samphuṭṭha dhātu iti

analyzed: nissitā eva nāma ati āha pathavī dhātu nissitā avāti attanā vā pana tad nissitā ati ekena

original: pariyāyenā”ti. Upādārupampi kāmaṃ nissitampi hoti. Tathāpi taṃ nissitaṃ hotiyevāti

original: Tena ca tathā paricchinnattā sabbampi bhūtupādārūpaṃ ākāsadhātunissitaṃ nāma. Taṃ
analyzed: tena ca tathā paricchinna ttā sabbam pi bhūtupādā rūpam ākāsadhātu nissitam nāma tam

analyzed: jotita ttā tena āha na labbhati iti rūpam eva ati rūpa āyatanam eva yadi evam cakkhu viññāṇa viññātabbesu

analyzed: sappītika taṇhā hi nandī iti vuccati taṇhāyana vasena taṇhā

original: Adhigantabbato adhigamo, jhānādiadhigamapucchā. Tenāha – “jhānavimokkhādīsū”tiādi. Upāyapucchāti adhigamopāyapucchā. Kintīti kena pakārena vidhināti attho.

original: Katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhīti idaṃ pana pubbe “kiṃ te adhigata”nti aniddhāritabhedā

original: Pākaṭo hoti adhigatavisesassa satisammosābhāvato. Sesapucchāsupi “pākaṭo hotī”ti

analyzed: tādisam sāvajjam na karoti

original: Dvāratoti kāyādidvārato. Kappaṭṭhitiyatoti “idaṃ kappaṭṭhitikavipākaṃ, idaṃ na kappaṭṭhitikavipāka”nti
analyzed: dvārato ti kāya ādi dvārato kappaṭṭhitiyato ti idam kappaṭṭhitika vipākam idam na kappaṭṭhitika vipākam ti

original: Yasmā manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva ca kusaladhammānaṃ tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpatti, yathā

analyzed: ānantariyam phusati maraṇa adhippāyena iva ānantariya vatthunaḥ vikopita ttā ānantariyam

analyzed: daṭṭhabbam saṅgāma catukkam sampatta vasena yojetabbam

original: Tenevāti teneva payogena. Arahantaghāto hotiyeva arahato māritattā. Puthujjanasseva

original: yassa taṃ santakaṃ kataṃ. Tasseva dinnaṃ hotīti.

original: Lohitaṃ samo saratīti abhighātena pakuppamānaṃ sañcitaṃ hoti. Mahantataranti garutaraṃ. Sarīrapaṭijaggane viyāti satthurūpakāyapaṭijaggane viya.

original: Asannipatiteti idaṃ sāmaggiyadīpanaṃ. Bhedo ca hotīti saṅghassa bhedo hoti. Vaṭṭatīti

original: Kāyadvārameva pūrenti kāyakammabhāveneva lakkhitabbato.
analyzed: kāya dvāram eva pūrenti kāya kamma bhāvena iva lakkhitabbataḥ

analyzed: kālam tiṭṭheyya tam āyu kappam sandhāya vuttanti kappa vināseya iva ati pana āyu kappa vināseya iva ati

analyzed: aññāni ānantariya kammāni

original: Pakatattoti anukkhitto. Samānasaṃvāsakoti apārājiko. Samānasīmāyanti ekasīmāyaṃ.

original: 129. Abhijātiādisu pakappanena devatūpasaṅkamanādinā jātacakkavāḷena samānayogakkhemaṃ

original: visayabhūtaṃ ṭhānaṃ visayakhettaṃ. Dasasahassī lokadhātūti imāya lokadhātuyā saddhiṃ

original: dhammatāvasena veditabbo. “Pariggahavasenā”ti keci. “Sabbesampi buddhānaṃ tattakaṃ

analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: Sabbākāraparipūramevāti paripuṇṇalakkhaṇatāya sattussadādīhi sabbākārehi sampannameva.
analyzed: sabba ākāra paripūram eva ati paripuṇṇa lakkhaṇa tāya sattu ssat ādīhi sabba ākārehi sampannam eva

original: Na hi itthiyā kosohitavatthaguyhatā sambhavati, dutiyapakati ca nāma paṭhamapakatito
analyzed: na hi itthiyā kosohita vattha guyha tā sambhavati dutiya pakati ca nāma paṭhama pakatito

original: nihīnā eva. Tenevāha anantaravāre “yasmā”tiādi.
analyzed: nihīnāḥ eva tena iva āha anantara vāre

original: Idha purisassa tattha nibbattanatoti imasmiṃ manussaloke purisabhūtassa tattha brahmaloke
analyzed: idha purisassa tattha nibbattanato ti imasmin manussa loke purisa bhūtassa tattha brahma loke

original: brahmattabhāvena nibbattanato. Tena asatipi purisaliṅge purisākārā brahmāno hontīti
analyzed: brahmatta bhāvena nibbattanato tena asati pi purisa liṅge purisa ākārāḥ brahmānaḥ honti iti

original: dasseti. Taṃyeva hi purisākāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “yaṃ puriso brahmattaṃ kareyyā”ti.
analyzed: dassa iti tam yeva hi purisa ākāram sandhāya vuttam yam purisaḥ brahmattam kareyya iti

original: Tenevāha “samānepī”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ itthiyo brahmaloke na uppajjantīti āha “brahmatta”ntiādi.
analyzed: tena iva āha samāne api itiādi yadi evam itthiyaḥ brahma loke na uppajjanti iti āha

original: 131. Kāyaduccaritassātiādipāḷiyā kammaniyāmo nāma kathito. Samañjanaṃ samaṅgo, so
analyzed: kāya duccaritassa ati ādi pāḷiyā kammaniyāmaḥ nāma kathitaḥ samañjanam samaṅgo so

original: etassa atthīti samaṅgī, samannāgato. Samañjanasīlo vā samaṅgī. Pubbabhāge āyūhanasamaṅgitā,
analyzed: etassa atthi iti samaṅgī samannāgataḥ samañjana sīlaḥ vā samaṅgī pubbabhāge āyūhana samaṅgi tā

original: sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāvasena cetanāsamaṅgitā. Cetanāsantativasena vā āyūhanasamaṅgitā,
analyzed: sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanā vasena cetanā samaṅgi tā cetanā santati vasena vā āyūhana samaṅgi tā

original: taṃtaṃcetanākhaṇavasena cetanāsamaṅgitā. Katūpacitassa avipakkavipākassa kammassa
analyzed: taṃ taṃ cetanā khaṇa vasena cetanā samaṅgi tā katu upacitassa avipakka vipākassa kammassa

original: vasena kammasamaṅgitā, kamme pana vipaccituṃ āraddhe vipākappavattivasena vipākasamaṅgitā.
analyzed: vasena kamma samaṅgi tā kamme pana vipaccitum āraddhe vipāka ppavatti vasena vipāka samaṅgi tā

original: Kammādīnaṃ upaṭṭhānakālavasena upaṭṭhānasamaṅgitā. Kusalākusalakammāyūhanakkhaṇeti
analyzed: kamma ādīnam upaṭṭhāna kāla vasena upaṭṭhāna samaṅgi tā kusala akusala kamma āyūhana kkhaṇā iti

original: kusalakammassa ca akusalakammassa ca samīhanakkhaṇe. Tathāti iminā kusalākusalakammapadaṃ
analyzed: kusala kammassa ca akusala kammassa ca samīhana kkhaṇe tathā ati iminā kusala akusala kamma padam

original: ākaḍḍhati. Yathā kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti, tathā kataṃ upacitaṃ. Vipākārahanti
analyzed: ākaḍḍhati yathā katam kammam phala dāna samattham hoti tathā katam upacitam vipāka ārahanti

original: dutiyabhavādīsu vipaccanārahaṃ. Uppajjamānānaṃ upapattinimittaṃ upaṭṭhātīti yojanā.
analyzed: dutiya bhava ādīsu vipaccanā araham uppajjamānānam upapatti nimittam upaṭṭhāti iti yojanā

original: Calatīti parivattati. Ekena hi kammunā tajje nimitte upaṭṭhāpite paccayavisesavasena
analyzed: calati iti parivattati ekena hi kammunā tajje nimitte upaṭṭhāpite paccaya visesa vasena

original: tato aññena kammunā aññassa nimittassa upaṭṭhānaṃ parivattanaṃ.
analyzed: tatas aññena kammunā aññassa nimittassa upaṭṭhānam parivattanam

original: Sunakhajīvikoti sunakhehi jīvanasīlo. Talasantharaṇapūjanti bhūmitalassa pupphehi
analyzed: su nakha jīviko ti su nakhehi jīvana sīlo bhūmi talassa pupphehi

original: santaraṇapūjaṃ. Āyūhanacetanākammasamaṅgitāvasenāti kāyaduccaritassa aparāparaṃ āyūhanena
analyzed: santaraṇa pūjam āyūhana cetanā kamma samaṅgi tā vasena ati kāya duccaritassa apara aparam āyūhanena

original: sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya tasseva pakappane kammakkhayakarañāṇena akhepitattā yathūpacitakammunā
analyzed: sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanāya tassa iva pakappane kamma kkhaya kara ñāṇena a khepita ttā yathā upacita kammunā

original: ca samaṅgibhāvassa vasena.
analyzed: ca samaṅgi bhāvassa vasena

original: 132. Evaṃ sassirikanti vuttappakārena anekadhātuvibhajanādinā nānānayavicittatāya paramanipuṇagambhīratāya ca atthato byañjanato ca sasobhaṃ katvā.
analyzed: evam vutta ppakārena aneka dhātu vibhajana ādinā nānā naya vicitta tāya parama nipuṇa gambhīra tāya ca atthataḥ byañjanataḥ ca sa sobham katvā

original: Naṃ dhārehīti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ. Dhātuādivasena parivaṭṭīyanti atthā etehīti
analyzed: naṃ dhārehi iti ettha na nti nipāta mattam dhātu ādi vasena parivaṭṭīyanti

original: parivaṭṭā, desanābhedā. Cattāro parivaṭṭā etassa, etasmiṃ vāti catuparivaṭṭo, dhammapariyāyo.
analyzed: parivaṭṭāḥ desanā bhedā cattāro parivaṭṭāḥ etassa etasmin vā ati catu parivaṭṭaḥ dhammapariyāyo

original: Dhammo ca so pariyattibhāvato yathāvuttenatthena ādāsoti dhammādāso. Upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena
analyzed: dhammo ca so pariyatti bhāvataḥ yathā vuttena atthena ādāso ti dhamma ādāsaḥ upaṭṭhāna ṭṭhena

original: yathādhammānaṃ ādāsotipi dhammādāso. Yathā hi ādāsena sattānaṃ mukhe maladosaharaṇaṃ,
analyzed: yathā adhammānam ādāsaḥ ti pi dhamma ādāsaḥ yathā hi ādāsena sattānam mukhe mala dosa haraṇam

original: evaṃ imināpi suttena yogīnaṃ mukhe maladosaharaṇaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā iminā suttena kilese
analyzed: evam iminā api suttena yogīnam mukhe mala dosa haraṇam tasmā ati yasmai iminā suttena kilese

original: madditvā samathādhigamena yogino jayappattā; tasmā amatapurappavesane ugghosanamahābheritāya
analyzed: madditvā samatha adhigamena yoginaḥ jaya ppattā tasmai amata pura ppavesane ugghosana mahā bheritāya

original: ca amatadundubhi. Idha vuttanti imasmiṃ sutte vuttaṃ. Anuttaro saṅgāmavijayoti anuttarabhāvato
analyzed: ca idha vuttanti imasmin sutte vuttam anuttaraḥ saṅgāma vijayaḥ iti anuttara bhāvataḥ

original: kilesasaṅgāmavijayo, “vijeti etenā”ti katvā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: kilesa saṅgāma vijayaḥ vijeti etena ati katvā sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Bahudhātukasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: bahudhātuka sutta vaṇṇanāya līnattha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 6. Isigilisuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: isigili sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 133. Samaññāyati etāyāti samaññā, nāmanti attho. Ayamayaṃ nāmāti paññāpenti etāya,
analyzed: samaññāyati etāya ati samaññā nāman ti atthaḥ ayam ayam nāma ati paññāpenti etāya

original: tathāpaññāpanamattanti vā paññatti, nāmameva. Tenāha “purimapadasseva vevacana”nti.
analyzed: vā paññatti nāmam eva tena āha purima padassa iva vevacanan ti

original: Sesesupīti “paṇḍavassa pabbatassā”tiādīsu tīsu vāresupi.
analyzed: sesesu pi iti paṇḍavassa pabbatassa ati ādīsu tīsu vāresu pi

original: Samuṭṭhānaṃ tāva suttassa kathetvā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ “tadā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: samuṭṭhānam tāva suttassa kathetvā attha saṃvaṇṇanam kātum tadā kirāti ādi vuttaṃ

original: Na pabbatehi atthoti na bhagavato pabbatehi kathitehi attho atthi. Isigilibhāvoti
analyzed: na pabbatehi atthaḥ ti na bhagavataḥ pabbatehi kathitehi atthaḥ atthi isigili bhāvaḥ ti

original: isigilināmatā. Itīti iminā kāraṇena, imaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ avekkhantoti attho.
analyzed: isigili nāmatā iti iti iminā kāraṇena imam aṭṭhuppattim avekkhanto ti attho

original: Cetiyagabbheti cetiyaghare cetiyassa abbhantare. Yamakamahādvāranti yamakakavāṭayuttaṃ
analyzed: cetiya gabbhe ti cetiya ghare cetiyassa abbhantare yamaka mahā dvāram ti yamaka kavāṭa yuttam

original: mahantaṃ dvāraṃ. Dvedhā katvāti pabbatassa abbhantare maṇḍapasaṅkhepena leṇaṃ nimminitvā
analyzed: mahantam dvāram dvedhā katvā ati pabbatassa abbhantare maṇḍapa saṅkhepena leṇam nimminitvā

original: dvedhā katvā tadā te tattha vasiṃsu.
analyzed: dvedhā katvā tadā te tattha vasiṃsu

original: Vasitakālañca kathento tesaṃ mātuyā yāva tatiyabhavato paṭṭhāya samudāgamaṃ dassetuṃ,
analyzed: vasita kālañca kathento tesam mātuyā yāva tatiya bhavataḥ paṭṭhāya samudāgamam dassetuṃ

original: “atīte kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Patthesīti tassā kira khettakuṭiyā vīhayo bhajjantiyā tattha
analyzed: atīte kira atiādi vuttam patthesi iti tassā kira khetta kuṭiyā vīhayaḥ bhajjantiyā tattha

original: mahākarañjapupphappamāṇā mahantā manoharā pañcasatamattā lājā jāyiṃsu. Sā tā gahetvā
analyzed: mahā karañja puppha ppamāṇāḥ mahantāḥ manoharā pañca sata mattāḥ lājāḥ jāyiṃsu sā tāḥ gahetvā

original: mahante paduminipatte ṭhapesi. Tasmiñca samaye eko paccekabuddho tassā anuggahatthaṃ
analyzed: mahante padumini patte ṭhapesi tasmin ca samaye ekaḥ paccekabuddho tassāḥ anuggaha ttham

original: avidūre khettapāḷiyā gacchati. Sā taṃ disvā pasannamānasā supupphitaṃ mahantaṃ ekaṃ
analyzed: avidūre khetta pāḷiyā gacchati sā tam disvā pasanna mānasā su pupphitam mahantam ekam

original: padumaṃ gahetvā tattha lāje pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena
analyzed: padumam gahetvā tattha lāje pakkhipitvā paccekabuddham upasaṅkamitvā pañca patiṭṭhitena

original: vanditvā, “imassa, bhante, puññassa ānubhāvena ānubhāvasampanne pañcasataputte labheyya”nti
analyzed: vanditvā imassa bhante puññassa ānubhāvena ānubhāva sampanne pañcasata putte labheyyanti

original: pañca puttasatāni patthesi. Tasmiṃyeva khaṇeti yadā sā yathāvuttaṃ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi;
analyzed: pañca putta satāni patthesi tasmin yeva khaṇe iti yadā sā yathāvuttam patthanam paṭṭhapesi

original: tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pañcasatā migaluddakā sambhatasambhārā paripakkapaccekabodhiñāṇā
analyzed: tasmiṃ yeva khaṇe pañca satā miga luddakā sambhata sambhārā paripakka pacceka bodhi ñāṇā

original: tasseva paccekabuddhassa madhuramaṃsaṃ datvā, “etissā puttā bhaveyyāmā”ti patthayiṃsu.
analyzed: tassa iva paccekabuddhassa madhura maṃsam da tvā etissā puttāḥ bhaveyyāma ati patthayiṃsu

original: Atītāsu anekajātīsu tassā puttabhāvena āgatattā tathā tesaṃ ahosīti vadanti. Pāduddhāreti
analyzed: atītāsu aneka jātīsu tassā putta bhāvena āgata ttā tathā tesam ahosi iti vadanti pāduddhāra iti

original: pāduddhāre pāduddhāre. Pāduddhārasīsena cettha nikkhipanaṃ āha.
analyzed: pāduddhāre pāduddhāre pāduddhāra sīsena ca ittha nikkhipanam āha

original: Gabbhamalaṃ nissāyāti bahi nikkhantaṃ gabbhamalaṃ nissayaṃ katvā saṃsedajabhāvena
analyzed: gabbha malam nissāya ati bahi nikkhantam gabbha malam nissayam katvā saṃseda ja bhāvena

original: nibbattā. Opapātikabhāvenāti keci. Khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvāti vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā.
analyzed: nibbattāḥ opapātika bhāvena ati keci khaya vayam paṭṭhapetvā ati vipassanam ārabhitvā

original: Vipassanāti aniccānupassanāpubbikā sappaccayanāmarūpadassanapubbikā ca, saṅkhāre
analyzed: vipassanā ati anicca anupassanā pubbikā sappaccaya nāma rūpa dassana pubbikā ca saṅkhāre

original: sammasantassa aniccalakkhaṇe diṭṭhe, “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti
analyzed: sammasantassa anicca lakkhaṇe diṭṭhe yat aniccam tat dukkham yat dukkham tat anattā ti

original: sesalakkhaṇāni suviññeyyāneva honti. Paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattayiṃsūti dve asaṅkhyeyyāni
analyzed: sesa lakkhaṇāni su viññeyyāna eva honti pacceka bodhi ñāṇam nibbattayiṃsu iti dve asaṅkhyeyyāni

original: kappānaṃ satasahassañca paccekabodhipāramitāya parinipphannattā ñāṇassa paripākattā
analyzed: kappānam sata sahassañca pacceka bodhi pāramitāya parinipphanna ttā ñāṇassa paripāka ttā

original: vuttanayena sayameva vipassanaṃ pavattetvā matthakaṃ pāpetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ adhigacchiṃsu.
analyzed: vutta nayena sayam eva vipassanam pavattetvā matthakam pāpetvā pacceka bodhi ñāṇam adhigacchiṃsu

original: Sabbepi te taṃyeva gāthaṃ abhāsiṃsūti āha – “ayaṃ tesaṃ byākaraṇagāthā ahosī”ti.
analyzed: sabbe api te taṃyeva gātham abhāsiṃsu iti āha ayam tesam byākaraṇa gāthā ahosi iti

original: Saroruhanti sarasi jātaṃ. Padumapalāsapattajanti khuddakamahantehi kamaladalehi sahajātaṃ.
analyzed: saroruhanti sarasi jātam paduma palāsa patta janti khuddaka mahantehi kamala dalehi sahajātam

original: Khuddakamahantakamaladalasaṅkhātāni vā padumapalāsapattāni ettha santīti padumapalāsapattaṃ,
analyzed: khuddaka mahantaka mala dala saṅkhātāni vā paduma palāsa pattāni ettha santi iti paduma palāsa pattam

original: padumagacchaṃ. Tattha jātanti padumapalāsapattajaṃ. Supupphitanti suṭṭhu pupphitaṃ
analyzed: padumagaccham tattha jātanti paduma palāsa patta jam su pupphitanti suṭṭhu pupphitam

original: sammā vikasitaṃ. Bhamaragaṇānuciṇṇanti bhamaragaṇehi anukulañceva anuparibbhamitañca.
analyzed: sammā vikasitam bhamara gaṇā anuciṇṇanti bhamara gaṇehi anukulam ca iva anuparibbhamitam ca

original: Aniccatāyupagatanti khaṇe khaṇe vaṇṇabhedādivasena aniccatāya upagataṃ. Viditvāti
analyzed: anicca tāyupagatam ti khaṇe khaṇe vaṇṇa bheda ādi vasena anicca tāya upagatam viditvā iti

original: vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya jānitvā. Eko careti tasmā aññopi mādiso hotukāmo
analyzed: vipassanā paññā sahitāya magga paññāya jānitvā ekaḥ careti tasmai aññaḥ api mādisaḥ hotu kāmo

original: evaṃ paṭipajjitvā eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
analyzed: evam paṭipajjitvā ekaḥ care khagga visāṇa kappo ti

original: 135. Satisārasīlasārādisamannāgamanena sattesu sārabhūtā. Sabbaso vaṭṭadukkhassa vigatattā niddukkhā. Samucchinnataṇhatāya nittaṇhā. Mānacchidoti thutivacanaṃ.
analyzed: sati sāra sīla sāra ādi samannāgamanena sattesu sāra bhūtā sabbasas vaṭṭa dukkhassa vigata ttā niddukkhā samucchinna taṇhatāya nittaṇhā māna chidā iti thuti vacanam

original: Etesaṃ ekanāmakāyevāti etesaṃ āgatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā aññe paccekabuddhā
analyzed: etesam eka nāmakāya iva ati etesam āgatānam paccekabuddhānam pāḷiyam anāgatāḥ aññe paccekabuddhāḥ

original: samānanāmakā eva. Vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ “imesu hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Visuṃ
analyzed: samāna nāmakāḥ eva vuttam evattham pākaṭīkaraṇa ttham imesu hi itiādi vuttam visum

original: visuṃ avatvāti paccekaṃ sarūpato avatvā. Aññe cāti asādhāraṇattā āha. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: visum avatvā iti paccekam sarūpataḥ avatvā aññe ca ati asādhāraṇattā āha sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Isigilisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: isigili sutta vaṇṇanāya līnattha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 7. Mahācattārīsakasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: mahācattārīsaka sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 136. Dosehi ārakāti ariyaṃ. Tenāha “niddosa”nti. Sā pana niddosatā lokuttarabhāvena
analyzed: dosehi ariyam tena āha niddosanti sā pana niddosa tā lokuttara bhāvena

original: savisesāti āha “lokuttara”nti. Sammā sundaro pasattho niyyāniko samādhi sammāsamādhīti
analyzed: sa visesā ti āha lokuttaran ti sammā sundaraḥ pasatthaḥ niyyānikaḥ samādhi sammāsamādhi iti

original: āha – “sammāsamādhinti maggasamādhi”nti. Upanisīdati ettha phalaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāyāti
analyzed: āha sammāsamādhin ti magga samādhin ti upanisīdati ettha phalam tad paṭibaddha vutti tāya ati

original: upanisaṃ, kāraṇanti āha – “saupanisanti sappaccaya”nti. Parikaroti parivāretīti parikkhāroti
analyzed: upanisam kāraṇam ti āha sa upanisanti sa paccayanti parikaroti parivāreti iti

original: āha – “saparikkhāranti saparivāra”nti.
analyzed: āha sa parikkhāranti sa parivāranti

original: Parivāritāti sahajātādipaccayabhāvena parivārantehi viya upagatā. Purecārikāti vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvanā
analyzed: parivāritā ati sahajāta ādi paccaya bhāvena upagatā purecārikā ati vuṭṭhāna gāmini bhāvanā

original: sahajātādipaccayavasena paccayattā purassarā. Tenāha – “vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi cā”ti.
analyzed: sahajāta ādi paccaya vasena paccaya ttā purassarā tena āha vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi ca ati

original: Idāni tāni kiccato dassetuṃ, “vipassanāsammādiṭṭhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha parivīmaṃsaggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: idāni tāni kiccataḥ dassetum vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi itiādi vuttam tattha parivīmaṃsa ggahaṇam

original: tattha tattha cittuppāde vīmaṃsādhipateyyena pavattiyā sammādiṭṭhiyā pubbaṅgamabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
analyzed: tattha tattha cittuppāde vīmaṃsā ādhipateyyena pavattiyā sammādiṭṭhiyā pubbaṅgama bhāva dassana attham

original: Tenassa maggasamādhissa nānākhaṇikaṃ pubbaṅgamabhāvaṃ dasseti. Vīmaṃsanapariyosāneti
analyzed: tena assa magga samādhissa nānākhaṇikam pubbaṅgama bhāvam dasseti vīmaṃsana pariyosāne ti

original: tathāpavattaanulomañāṇassa osāne. Bhūmiladdhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ samugghāṭayamānāti attano santāne
analyzed: tathā pavatta anuloma ñāṇassa osāne bhūmi laddham vaṭṭam samugghāṭayamānā ati attano santāne

original: dīgharattaṃ anusayitaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ samucchindanti. Vūpasamayamānāti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
analyzed: dīgharattam anusayitam kilesa vaṭṭam samucchindanti tassa iva vevacanam

original: Vūpasamayamānāti vā tato eva avasiṭṭhampi vaṭṭaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena vūpasamenti.
analyzed: vā tatas eva avasiṭṭham pi vaṭṭam appavatti karaṇa vasena vūpasamenti

original: Tenevāha – “maggasammādiṭṭhi…pe… uppajjatī”ti. Sāti sammādiṭṭhi. Duvidhāpīti yathāvuttā
analyzed: tena iva āha magga sammādiṭṭhi pe uppajjati iti sā ati sammādiṭṭhi duvidhā api iti yathā vuttā

original: duvidhāpi. Idha adhippetā vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya kiccassa dassitattā.
analyzed: duvidhā api idha adhippetā vipassanā paññā sahitāya magga paññāya kiccassa dassita ttā

original: Lakkhaṇe paṭivijjhamāne lakkhaṇiko dhammo paṭividdho hotīti āha – “micchādiṭṭhiṃ…pe…
analyzed: lakkhaṇe paṭivijjhamāne lakkhaṇikaḥ dhammaḥ paṭividdhaḥ hoti iti āha

original: ārammaṇato pajānātī”ti. Vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyampi eseva nayo. Kiccatoti bhāvanākiccato.
analyzed: ārammaṇato pajānāti iti vipassanā sammādiṭṭhiyam pi esa eva nayo kiccato ti bhāvanā kiccato

original: Sammādiṭṭhiyaṃ tadadhigataasammohatāya asammohato pajānāti. Kiccatoti paṭivedhakiccato.
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhiyam tad adhigata asammohatāya asammohataḥ pajānāti kiccato ti paṭivedha kiccato

original: Taṃ pana sabbathā asammuyhanamevāti āha “asammohato”ti. Evaṃ pajānanāti micchādiṭṭhi
analyzed: tat pana sabbathā a sammuyhanam eva ati āha asammohato ti evam pajānanā ati micchādiṭṭhi

original: micchādiṭṭhīti yāthāvato avabodho. Assāti taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa.
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhī iti yāthāvataḥ avabodhaḥ assa ati tad samaṅgino puggalassa

original: Dvāyanti -kāro dīghaṃ katvā vutto. Tenāha “dvayaṃ vadāmī”ti. Dve avayavā etassāti
analyzed: kāraḥ dīgham katvā vuttaḥ tena āha dvayam vadāmi iti dve avayavāḥ etassa ati

original: dvayaṃ. Tenāha “duvidhakoṭṭhāsaṃ vadāmī”ti. Puññassa eko bhāgo so eva puññabhāgiko,
analyzed: dvayam tena āha duvidha koṭṭhāsam vadāmi iti puññassa ekaḥ bhāgo so eva puññabhāgiko

original: ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā itthiliṅgavasena “puññabhāgiyā”ti vuttaṃ. Upadhisaṅkhātassāti
analyzed: kakārassa yakāram katvā itthi liṅga vasena puññabhāgiyā iti vuttam upadhi saṅkhātassa ati

original: khandhapabandhasaṅkhātassa.
analyzed: khandha pabandha saṅkhātassa

original: Amatadvāranti ariyamaggaṃ. Paññapetīti niyyānādipakārato paññapeti. Tenāha “vibhajitvā
analyzed: amata dvāram ti ariya maggam paññapeti iti niyyāna ādi pakārato paññapeti tena āha vibhajitvā

original: dassetī”ti. Tattha sammohassa viddhaṃsanena asammohato dasseti. Tasmiṃ attheti amatadvārapaññāpane
analyzed: dasseti iti tattha sammohassa viddhaṃsanena asammohataḥ dasseti tasmin atthe ti amata dvāra paññāpane

original: atthe. Bojjhaṅgappattāti bojjhaṅgabhāvappattā. Maggabhāvena niyyānabhāvena pavattiyā
analyzed: atthe bojjhaṅga ppattā ati bojjhaṅga bhāva ppattā magga bhāvena niyyāna bhāvena pavattiyā

original: maggapaññāya aṭṭhannampi sādhāraṇattā samudāyassa ca avayavo aṅganti katvā sesadhamme
analyzed: magga paññāya aṭṭhannam pi sādhāraṇa ttā samudāyassa ca avayavaḥ aṅganti katvā sesa dhamme

original: aṅgikabhāvena dassento “ariyamaggassa aṅga”nti āha. So bhikkhūti micchādiṭṭhiṃ “micchādiṭṭhī”ti
analyzed: aṅgika bhāvena dassentaḥ ariya maggassa aṅganti āha saḥ bhikkhu iti micchādiṭṭhim micchādiṭṭhī iti

original: sammādiṭṭhiṃ “sammādiṭṭhī”ti jānanto bhikkhu. Pajahanatthāyāti samucchedavasena pajahanāya.
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhim sammādiṭṭhī iti jānantaḥ bhikkhu pajahana tthāya ati samuccheda vasena pajahanāya

original: Paṭilābhatthāyāti maggasammādiṭṭhiyā adhigamāya. Kusalavāyāmoti vipassanāsampayuttova
analyzed: paṭilābha atthāya ati magga sammādiṭṭhiyāḥ adhigamāya kusala vāyāmaḥ ti vipassanā sampayuttaḥ eva

original: kosallasambhūto vāyāmo. Saratīti sato, taṃ panassa saraṇaṃ satisamaṅgitāyāti āha
analyzed: kosalla sambhūtaḥ vāyāmaḥ sarati iti sato tam panassa saraṇam sati samaṅgi tāya ati āha

original: “satiyā samannāgato”ti. Kāmañcettha vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiṃ yathābhūtā sammāvāyāmasatiyo
analyzed: satiyā samannāgataḥ ti kāmañca ittha vipassanā sammādiṭṭhim yathābhūtā sammāvāyāma satiyaḥ

original: sahajātā ca purejātā ca hutvā parivārenti, “itiyime tayo dhammā sammādiṭṭhiṃ anuparidhāvanti
analyzed: sahajātā ca purejātā ca hutvā parivārenti iti ime tayo dhammā sammādiṭṭhim anuparidhāvanti

original: anuparivattantī”ti pana vacanato, “ettha hī”tiādinā maggasammādiṭṭhiyā eva sesadhammānaṃ
analyzed: anuparivattanti iti pana vacanataḥ ettha hi iti ādinā magga sammādiṭṭhiyāḥ eva sesa dhammānam

original: yathārahaṃ sahacaraṇabhāvena parivāraṇaṃ yojitaṃ. Sammāsaṅkappādīnanti ādi-saddena
analyzed: yathāraham sahacaraṇa bhāvena parivāraṇam yojitam ādi saddena

original: sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ gahaṇaṃ itaresaṃ parivārabhāvena gahitattā. Na hi sakkā
analyzed: gahaṇam itaresam parivāra bhāvena gahita ttā na hi sakkā

original: te eva parivāre parivāravante ca katvā vattuṃ saṅkarato sammohajananato ca. Tayoti
analyzed: te eva parivāre parivāravante ca katvā vattum saṅkarataḥ sammoha jananataḥ ca

original: sammādiṭṭhivāyāmasatiyo sahajātaparivārāva honti maggakkhaṇikānaṃ tesaṃ adhippetattā
analyzed: sammā diṭṭhi vāyāma satiyaḥ sahajāta parivārāḥ va honti magga khaṇikānam tesam adhippeta ttā

original: vipassanākhaṇaviratīnaṃ asambhavato.
analyzed: vipassanā khaṇa viratīnam asambhavato

original: 137. Takkanavasena lokasiddhenāti adhippāyo. “Evañcevañca bhavitabba”nti vividhaṃ
analyzed: takkana vasena loka siddhena ati adhippāyaḥ evam ca ivam ca bhavitabbanti vividham

original: takkanaṃ kūpe viya udakassa ārammaṇassa ākaḍḍhanaṃ vitakkanaṃ vitakko. Saṅkappanavasenāti
analyzed: takkanam kūpe viya udakassa ārammaṇassa ākaḍḍhanam vitakkanam vitakko saṅkappana vasena ati

original: taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kappanavasena. Takkanaṃ kappananti ca ataṃsahajātānamevāti
analyzed: tam tam ārammaṇam gahetvā kappana vasena takkanam ca

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekaggoti iminā samādhinā laddhupakārasseva vitakkassa appanāpariyāyo
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam ekaggaḥ ti iminā samādhinā laddha upakārassa iva vitakkassa appanā pariyāyaḥ

original: hotīti dasseti. Visesena vā appanā vitakkassa vasena cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhiropeti,
analyzed: hoti iti dasseti visesena vā appanā vitakkassa vasena cittam ārammaṇam abhiropeti

original: vitakke asati kathanti āha “vitakke panā”tiādi. Attanoyeva dhammatāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: vitakke asati katham ti āha vitakke pana atiādi attanoyā iva dhamma tāya cittam ārammaṇam

original: abhiruhatīti, etena ārammaṇadhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ nāma sabhāvasiddhaṃ, na dhammantaramapekkhati,
analyzed: abhiruhati iti etena ārammaṇa dhammānam gahaṇam nāma sa bhāva siddham na dhamma antaram apekkhati

original: vitakko pana pavattamāno ārammaṇābhiniropanavaseneva pavattatīti dasseti. Evaṃ santepi
analyzed: vitakkaḥ pana pavattamānaḥ ārammaṇa abhiniropana vasena iva pavattati iti dasseti evam sante pi

original: sabhāvāvitakkacittuppādato savitakkacittuppādassa ārammaṇaggahaṇaviseso vitakkena
analyzed: sa bhāva a vitakka cittuppādato sa vitakka cittuppādassa ārammaṇa ggahaṇa visesaḥ vitakkena

analyzed: jātaḥ ti katvā vitakko cittassa ārammaṇa ggahaṇe visesa paccayaḥ ti pākaṭaḥ ayam atthaḥ apare

original: ārohati anupavisati, evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati vitakkassa ārammaṇābhiniropanasabhāvattā,
analyzed: ārohati anupavisati evam vitakkam nissāya cittam ārammaṇam ārohati vitakkassa ārammaṇa abhiniropana sabhāva ttā

original: aññesaṃ dhammānañca avitakkasabhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā – “cetaso abhiniropanā”ti.
analyzed: aññesam dhammānam ca a vitakka sabhāvato tena āha bhagavā cetasaḥ abhiniropanā ti

original: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti? Vitakkabaleneva. Yathā hi so
analyzed: yadi evam katham avitakka cittam ārammaṇam ārohati iti vitakka balena iva yathā hi so

analyzed: purisaḥ paricayena tena vinā api nirāsaṅkaḥ rāja geham pavisati evam paricayena vitakkena

analyzed: paricayena vitakkassa hi santāne abhiṇham pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇa abhiruhanaṃ

original: ciraparicitaṃ; tena taṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha pavattateva; yathā ñāṇasahagataṃ

analyzed: yathā vā kilesa sahitam hutvā pavattam sabbaso kilesa rahitam pi paricayena kilesa vāsanā vasena

original: pavattati, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: pavattati evam sampadam idam daṭṭhabbam

original: Vācaṃ saṅkharotīti vācaṃ uppādeti, vacīghosuppattiyā visesapaccayo hotīti attho.
analyzed: vācam saṅkharoti iti vācam uppādeti vacī ghosa uppattiyā visesa paccayaḥ hoti iti attho

original: Lokiyavitakko dvattiṃsacittasahagato vācaṃ saṅkharoti vacīviññattijananato. Vacīsaṅkhārotveva
analyzed: lokiya vitakkaḥ dvattiṃsa citta sahagataḥ vācam saṅkharoti vacī viññatti jananataḥ

original: panassa nāmaṃ hoti ruḷhito, taṃsamatthatānirodhato vā sambhavato pana saṅkhāroti.
analyzed: panassa nāmam hoti ruḷhitaḥ taṃ samattha tā nirodhataḥ vā sambhavataḥ pana saṅkhāro ti

analyzed: lokuttara sammāsaṅkappam parivārenti iti vatvā tividhe sammāsaṅkappe kadāci katamam

analyzed: samucchindanena sa atisayam tiṇṇam pi kicca karaṇataḥ esa nayo sammā vācā ādīsu pi

analyzed: viramati etāya ati veramaṇī virati vuccati sā musāvādataḥ viramaṇassa kāraṇa bhāvato

analyzed: cetanā api verassa maṇanataḥ vināsanataḥ virati pi iti āha virati pi cetanā api vaṭṭati iti

original: Ārakā ramatīti samucchinnehi dūrato samussāreti. Vinā tehi ramatīti accantameva tehi
analyzed: ārakā ramati iti samucchinnehi dūratas vinā tehi ramati iti accantam eva tehi

original: 140. Tividhena kuhanavatthunāti paccayapaṭisevana-sāmantajappana-iriyāpathapavattanasaṅkhātena
analyzed: tividhena kuhana vatthunā ati paccaya paṭisevana sāmanta jappana eriyāpatha pavattana saṅkhātena

original: nimittaṃ sīlaṃ etesanti yojanā. Attavisayalābhahetu akkosanakhuṃsanavambhanādivasena
analyzed: nimittam sīlam yojanā atta visaya lābha hetu akkosana khuṃsana vambhana ādi vasena

original: evaṃ lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīṃsatīti lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīṃsanā. Pāḷiyaṃ āgato kuhanādivasena
analyzed: evam lābhena lābham nijigīṃsati iti lābhena lābham nijigīṃsanā kuhanā ādi vasena

original: micchāājīvo. Ko pana soti āha “ājīvahetū”tiādi. Tāsaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ, “ājīvo kuppamāno
analyzed: micchāājīvo kaḥ pana saḥ ti āha ājīva hetu utiādi tāsam yeva ati avadhāraṇam ājīvo kuppamāno

original: kāyavacīdvāresu eva kuppatī”ti katvā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: kāyavacī dvāresu eva kuppati iti katvā vuttam

original: 141. Sammā pasatthā sobhanā niyyānikā diṭṭhi etassāti sammādiṭṭhi, puggalo. Tassa
analyzed: sammā pasatthā sobhanā niyyānikā diṭṭhi etassa ati sammādiṭṭhi puggalo tassa

original: pana yasmā sammādiṭṭhi saccābhisamayassa nibbānasacchikiriyāya avassayo, tasmā vuttaṃ

original: – “maggasammādiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassā”ti. Pahoti bhavati tāya saheva uppajjati pavattati.
analyzed: magga sammādiṭṭhiyam ṭhitassa ati pahoti bhavati tāya saha iva uppajjati pavattati

original: Paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ yāthāvato jānanaṭṭhena sammāñāṇanti idhādhippetaṃ, tañca kho maggasamādhimhi
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇam yāthāvataḥ jānana ṭṭhena sammāñāṇan ti idha adhippetam tat ca kho magga samādhimhi

analyzed: ṭhite eva hoti iti imam attham dassetum āha sammāñāṇam pahoti itiādi

original: Iminā kiṃ dassetīti? Yathā maggasammādiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhito puggalo, “sammādiṭṭhī”ti vutto,
analyzed: iminā kim dasseti iti yathā magga sammādiṭṭhiyam ṭhitaḥ puggalo sammādiṭṭhī iti vuttaḥ

original: evaṃ maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇe ṭhito, “sammāñāṇo”ti vutto, tassa ca maggaphalasammāsamādhipavattiyā
analyzed: evam magga phala paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇe ṭhito sammāñāṇo ti vutto tassa ca magga phala sammāsamādhi pavattiyā

analyzed: pahoti sammāñāṇassa sammāvimuttiyā pahoti iti imam attham dasseti phala samādhi tāva

original: pavattatu, maggasamādhi pana kathanti? Tampi akuppabhāvatāya accantasamādhibhāvato
analyzed: pavattatu magga samādhi pana kathanti tam pi akuppa bhāva tāya accanta samādhi bhāvato

original: kiccanipphattiyā pavattatevāti vattabbataṃ labhati. Ṭhapetvā aṭṭhaphalaṅgānīti phalabhūtāni
analyzed: kicca nipphattiyā pavattatā iva āti vattabba tam labhati ṭhapetvā aṭṭhaphalaṅgāni iti phala bhūtāni

original: sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni, “sammādiṭṭhissa sammāsaṅkappo pahotī”tiādinā visuṃ gahitattā
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhi ādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni sammādiṭṭhissa sammāsaṅkappo pahoti itiādinā visum gahita ttā

original: ṭhapetvā. Sammāñāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ katvāti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sammāñāṇaṃ katvā.
analyzed: ṭhapetvā sammāñāṇam paccavekkhaṇam katvā ati paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇam sammāñāṇam katvā

original: Phalaṃ kātunti phaladhammasahacaritatāya vipākasabhāvatāya ca “phala”nti laddhanāme
analyzed: phalam kātunti phala dhamma sahacarita tāya vipāka sabhāva tāya ca phalanti laddha nāme

analyzed: manussesu iti idam pakati cāritta vasena vuttam manussitthiyā nāma manussa purisesu

original: purisādhippāyacittaṃ uppajjeyyā”ti, bodhisattamātu pana devesūpi tādisaṃ cittaṃ nuppajjateva.
analyzed: purisa adhippāya cittam uppajjeyyāti bodhisatta mātu pana devesu upi tādisam cittam na uppajjateva

original: Yathā bodhisattassa ānubhāvena bodhisattassa mātu purisādhippāyacittaṃ nuppajjati,
analyzed: yathā bodhisattassa ānubhāvena bodhisattassa mātu purisa adhippāya cittam nuppajjati

original: evaṃ tassa ānubhāveneva sā kenaci purisena anatikkamanīyāti āha – “pādā na vahanti,
analyzed: evam tassa ānubhāvena iva sā kenacid purisena an atikkamanīyā iti āha pādāḥ na vahanti

original: dibbasaṅkhalikā viya bajjhantī”ti.
analyzed: dibba saṅkhalikāḥ viya bajjhanti iti

original: Pubbe “kāmaguṇūpasaṃhitaṃ cittaṃ nuppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ, puna “pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā
analyzed: pubbe kāma guṇa upasaṃhitam cittam na uppajjati iti vuttam puna pañcahi kāma guṇehi samappitā

original: samaṅgībhūtā paricāretī”ti vuttaṃ, kathamidaṃ aññamaññaṃ na virujjhatīti āha “pubbe”tiādi.
analyzed: samaṅgībhūtā paricāreti iti vuttam katham idam aññam aññam na virujjhati iti āha pubba itiādi

original: Vatthupaṭikkhepoti abrahmacariyavatthupaṭisedho. Tenāha “purisādhippāyavasenā”ti.
analyzed: vatthu paṭikkhepo ti abrahmacariya vatthu paṭisedho tena āha purisa adhippāya vasena ati

original: Ārammaṇapaṭilābhoti rūpādipañcakāmaguṇārammaṇasseva paṭilābho.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paṭilābho ti rūpa ādi pañca kāmaguṇa ārammaṇassa iva paṭilābhaḥ

original: 204. Kilamathoti khedo. Kāyassa hi garubhāvakaṭhinabhāvādayopi tassā tadā na honti
analyzed: kilamatho ti khedaḥ kāyassa hi garu bhāva kaṭhina bhāva ādayaḥ api tassā tadā na honti

original: eva. “Tirokucchigataṃ passatī”ti vuttaṃ, kadā paṭṭhāya passatīti āha – “kalalādikālaṃ
analyzed: eva tiro kucchi gatam passati iti vuttam kadā paṭṭhāya passati iti āha kalala ādi kālam

original: atikkamitvā”tiādi. Dassane payojanaṃ sayameva vadati, tassa abhāvato kalalādikāle
analyzed: atikkamitvā atiādi dassane payojanam sayam eva vadati tassa abhāvataḥ kalala ādi kāle

original: na passati. Puttenāti daharena mandena uttānaseyyakena. Yaṃ taṃ mātūtiādi pakaticārittavasena
analyzed: na passati puttena ati daharena mandena uttānaseyyakena yam tam mātu uti ādi pakati cāritta vasena

original: vuttaṃ. Cakkavattigabbhatopi hi savisesaṃ bodhisattagabbho parihāraṃ labhati puññasambhārassa
analyzed: vuttam cakkavatti gabbhataḥ pi hi sa visesam bodhisatta gabbhaḥ parihāram labhati puñña sambhārassa

original: sātisayattā, tasmā bodhisattamātā ativiya sappāyāhārācārā ca hutvā sakkaccaṃ pariharati.
analyzed: sā ati sa yattā tasmai bodhisatta mātā sappāya āhāra ācārā ca hutvā sakkaccam pariharati

original: Puratthābhimukhoti mātu puratthābhimukho. Idāni tirokucchigatassa dissamānatāya abbhantaraṃ
analyzed: purattha abhimukhaḥ ti mātu purattha abhimukhaḥ idāni tiro kucchi gatassa dissamāna tāya abbhantaram

original: bāhirañca kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ, “pubbe katakamma”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Assāti deviyā. Vatthunti
analyzed: bāhiram ca kāraṇam dassetum pubbe kata kamman tiādi vuttaṃ assa ati deviyā vatthunti

original: kucchiṃ. Phalikaabbhapaṭalādino viya bodhisattamātukucchitacassa paṭalabhāvena ālokassa
analyzed: kucchim phalika abbha paṭala ādinaḥ viya paṭala bhāvena ālokassa

original: vibandhābhāvato yathā bodhisattamātā kucchigataṃ bodhisattaṃ passati, kimevaṃ bodhisattopi
analyzed: vibandha abhāvataḥ yathā bodhisatta mātā kucchi gatam bodhisattam passati kim evam bodhisattaḥ api

original: mātaraṃ aññañca purato rūpagataṃ passati, noti āha, “bodhisatto panā”tiādi. Kasmā
analyzed: mātaram aññam ca puratas rūpa gatam passati no ti āha bodhisatto pana atiādi kasmā

original: pana sati cakkhumhi āloke ca na passatīti āha – “na hi antokucchiyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
analyzed: pana sati cakkhumhi āloke ca na passati iti āha na hi antokucchiyam cakkhu viññāṇam

original: uppajjatī”ti. Assāsapassāsā viya hi tattha cakkhuviññāṇampi na uppajjati tajjāsamannāhārassābhāvato.
analyzed: uppajjati iti assāsa passāsāḥ viya hi tattha cakkhu viññāṇam pi na uppajjati tajjā samannāhārassa abhāvato

original: 205. Yathā aññā itthiyo vijātapaccayā tādisena rogena abhibhūtāpi hutvā maranti,
analyzed: yathā aññāḥ itthiyaḥ vijāta paccayā tādisena rogena abhibhūtā api hutvā maranti

original: bodhisattamātu pana bodhisatte kucchigate na koci rogo uppajjati; kevalaṃ āyuparikkhayeneva
analyzed: bodhisatta mātu pana bodhisatte kucchi gate na koci rogaḥ uppajjati kevalam āyu parikkhayena iva

original: kālaṃ karoti, svāyamattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Bodhisattena vasitaṭṭhānaṃ hītiādinā
analyzed: kālam karoti bodhisattena vasita ṭṭhānam hi iti ādinā

original: tattha kāraṇamāha. Apanetvāti aggamahesiṭṭhānato nīharitvā. Anurakkhituṃ na sakkotīti
analyzed: tattha kāraṇam āha apanetvā iti agga mahesi ṭṭhānataḥ nīharitvā anurakkhitum na sakkoti iti

original: sammā gabbhaparihāraṃ nānuyuñjati, tena gabbho bahvābādho hoti. Vatthuvisadaṃ hotīti
analyzed: sammā gabbha parihāram na anuyuñjati tena gabbhaḥ bahu ābādhaḥ hoti vatthu visadam hoti iti

original: gabbhāsayo parisuddho hoti. Mātu majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse bodhisattassa gabbhokkamanampi
analyzed: gabbha āsayaḥ parisuddho hoti mātu majjhima vayassa tatiya koṭṭhāse bodhisattassa gabbha ukkamanam pi

original: tassā āyuparimāṇavilokaneneva saṅgahitaṃ vayovasena uppajjanakavikārassa parivajjanato,
analyzed: tassāḥ āyu parimāṇa vilokanena iva saṅgahitam vayaḥ vasena uppajjanaka vikārassa parivajjanato

original: itthisabhāvena uppajjanakavikāro pana bodhisattassa ānubhāveneva vūpasammati.
analyzed: itthi sabhāvena uppajjanaka vikāraḥ pana bodhisattassa ānubhāvena iva vūpasammati

original: Sattamāsajātoti paṭisandhiggahaṇato sattame māse jāto. So sītuṇhakkhamo na hoti ativiya
analyzed: satta māsa jātaḥ ti paṭisandhi ggahaṇato sattame māse jātaḥ saḥ sītuṇha khamaḥ na hoti

original: sukhumālatāya. Aṭṭhamāsajāto kāmaṃ sattamāsajātato buddhiavayavo, ekacce pana cammapadesā
analyzed: aṭṭha māsa jātaḥ kāmam satta māsa jātataḥ buddhi avayavaḥ ekacce pana camma padesā

original: na tāva te jātāti vadanti.
analyzed: na tāva te jātā ati vadanti

original: Ṭhitāva hutvāti niddukkhatāya ṭhitā eva hutvā. Dukkhassa hi balavabhāvato taṃ dukkhaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitā ava hutvā iti niddukkha tāya ṭhitāḥ eva hutvā dukkhassa hi balava bhāvato tam dukkham

original: asahamānā aññā itthiyo nisinnā vā nipannā vā vijāyanti. Upavijaññāti upagatavijāyanakālā.
analyzed: a sahamānāḥ aññāḥ itthiyaḥ nisinnāḥ vā nipannāḥ vā vijāyanti upavijaññāti upagata vijāyana kālā

original: Sakalanagaravāsinoti kapilavatthuṃ parivāretvā ṭhitesu devadahādīsu chasu nagaresu vasantā.
analyzed: sakala nagara vāsinaḥ ti kapilavatthum parivāretvā ṭhitesu deva daha ādīsu chasu nagaresu vasantā

original: Devā naṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantīti lokanāthaṃ mahāpurisaṃ mayameva paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti
analyzed: devāḥ nam paṭhamam paṭiggaṇhanti iti lokanātham mahā purisam mayam eva paṭhamam paṭiggaṇhāma ati

original: sañjātagāravabahumānā attano pītiṃ pavedentā khīṇāsavā suddhāvāsabrahmāno ādito paṭiggaṇhanti.
analyzed: sañjāta gārava bahu mānā attanaḥ pītim pavedentā khīṇa āsavā suddhāvāsa brahmānaḥ āditas paṭiggaṇhanti

original: Sūtivesanti sūtijagganadhātivesaṃ. Eketi uttaravihāravāsino. Macchakkhisadisaṃ chavivasena.
analyzed: sūtivesanti sūti jaggana dhātivesam eke iti uttaravihāra vāsinaḥ mad chakkhi sadisam chavi vasena

original: 206. Ajinappaveṇiyāti ajinacammehi sibbetvā katapaveṇiyā. Mahātejoti mahānubhāvo. Mahāyasoti mahāparivāro vipulakittighoso ca.
analyzed: ajina ppaveṇiyā ti ajina cammehi sibbetvā kata paveṇiyā mahā tejaḥ iti mahā anubhāvaḥ mahā yaso ti mahā parivāraḥ vipula kitti ghoso ca

original: Bhaggavibhaggāti sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhamanena vibhāvitattā bhaggā vibhaggā viya
analyzed: bhagga vibhaggā ti sambādha ṭṭhānataḥ nikkhamanena vibhāvita ttā bhaggāḥ vibhaggāḥ viya

analyzed: ca hutvā tena nesam avisada bhāvam eva dasseti alaggaḥ hutvā iti gabbha āsaye yoni padese

analyzed: sammakkhitassa tādisassa udaka semha ādikassa iva tattha abhāvataḥ bodhisattassa hi puñña anubhāvena

analyzed: vāyantam tiṭṭhati udakavaṭṭiyā uti udakakkhandhā

original: 207. Muhuttajātoti muhuttena jāto hutvā muhuttamattova. Anudhāriyamāneti anukūlavasena nīyamāne. Āgatānevāti taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatāni eva.
analyzed: muhutta jātā iti muhuttena jātaḥ hutvā muhutta mattaḥ uva anudhāriyamānā iti anukūla vasena nīyamāne āgatān eva ati tam ṭhānam upagatāni eva

original: Anekasākhanti ratanamayānekasatapatiṭṭhānahīrakaṃ. Sahassamaṇḍalanti tesaṃ upari patiṭṭhitaṃ anekasahassamaṇḍalahīrakaṃ. Marūti devā.

analyzed: na kho pana ivam daṭṭhabbanti satta padavī tihārataḥ pagā iva disā vilokanassa kata ttā tena āha

analyzed: mahāsattaḥ hi itiādi ekaṅgaṇāni iti vivaṭa bhāvena vihāra aṅgaṇa pariveṇa aṅgaṇāni eka aṅgaṇa sadisāni

original: ahesuṃ. Sadisopi natthīti tumhākaṃ idaṃ vilokanaṃ visiṭṭhe passituṃ idha tumhehi
analyzed: ahesum sadisaḥ api na atthi iti tumhākam idam vilokanam visiṭṭhe passitum idha tumhehi

analyzed: sadisaḥ api na atthi kutas uttaritaro ti āhaṃsu sabba paṭhamaḥ ti sabba ppadhānaḥ padhāna pariyāyo

original: hi idha paṭhamasaddo. Tenāha “itarānī”tiādi. Ettha ca mahesakkhā tāva devā tathā
analyzed: hi idha paṭhama saddaḥ tena āha itarāni itiādi ettha ca mahesakkhā tāva devā tathā

analyzed: vadanti itare pana kathanti mahāsattassa ānubhāva dassanena iva mahesakkhānam hi devānam

analyzed: mahāsattassa ānubhāvaḥ viya tena sadisānam pi ānubhāvaḥ paccakkhaḥ ahosi itare pana

original: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā saddahantā anuminantā tathā āhaṃsu.
analyzed: tesam vacanam sutvā saddahantā anuminantā tathā āhaṃsu

original: Jātamattasseva bodhisattassa ṭhānādīni yesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhūtānīti
analyzed: jāta mattassa iva bodhisattassa ṭhāna ādīni yesam visesa adhigamānam pubba nimitta bhūtāni iti

original: pubbanimittaṃ iddhipādavasena lokuttaradhammesu suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasamijjhanato. Uttarābhimukhabhāvo
analyzed: pubba nimittam iddhipāda vasena lokuttara dhammesu suppatiṭṭhita bhāva samijjhanataḥ uttara abhimukha bhāvaḥ

original: lokassa uttaraṇavasena gamanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Sattapadagamanaṃ sattabojjhaṅgādigamanassa
analyzed: lokassa uttaraṇa vasena gamanassa pubba nimittam satta pada gamanam satta bojjhaṅga ādi gamanassa

original: pubbanimittaṃ, visuddhachattadhāraṇaṃ suvisuddhavimuttichattadhāraṇassa pubbanimittaṃ,
analyzed: pubba nimittam visuddha chatta dhāraṇam su visuddha vimutti chatta dhāraṇassa pubba nimittam

original: pañcarājakakudhabhaṇḍāni pañcavidhavimuttiguṇaparivāratāya pubbanimittaṃ, anāvaṭadisānuvilokanaṃ

analyzed: an āvaṭa ñāṇa tāya pubba nimittam aggaḥ ham asmi iti ādi vacanam appaṭivattiya dhamma cakka pavattanassa

original: pubbanimittaṃ; ayamantimā jātīti āyatiṃ jātiyā abhāvakittanā anupādi…pe… pubbanimittanti
analyzed: pubba nimittam ayam antimā jātī iti āyatim jātiyāḥ abhāva kittanā an upādipe pubba nimittam ti

original: veditabbaṃ; tassa tassa anāgate laddhabbavisesassa taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ abyabhicārīnimittanti
analyzed: veditabbam tassa tassa anāgate laddhabba visesassa tam tam nimittam abyabhicārī nimittam ti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na āgatoti imasmiṃ sutte aññattha ca vakkhamānāya anupubbiyā anāgatataṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam na āgataḥ ti imasmin sutte aññattha ca vakkhamānāya anupubbiyā anāgata taṃ

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Āharitvāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte aṭṭhakathāsu ca āgatanayena āharitvā dīpetabbo.
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam āharitvā ti tasmim tasmim sutte aṭṭhakathāsu ca āgata nayena āharitvā dīpetabbaḥ

original: Dasasahassilokadhātu kampīti pana idaṃ satipi idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatatte vakkhamānānamacchariyānaṃ
analyzed: dasa sahassi lokadhātu pana idam idha pāḷiyam

original: mūlabhūtaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ aññampīdisaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tanti baddhā vīṇā, cammabaddhā

analyzed: bheriyā iti pañcaṅgika tūriyassa nidassana mattam ca saddena vā itaresam pi saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Bhijjiṃsūti pādesu baddhaṭṭhānesuyeva bhijjiṃsu. Vigacchiṃsūti vūpasamiṃsu. Sakatejobhāsitānīti
analyzed: bhijjiṃsu iti pādesu baddha ṭṭhānesu yā iva bhijjiṃsu vigacchiṃsu iti vūpasamiṃsu saka tejaḥ bhāsitāni iti

original: ativiya samujjalāya attano pabhāya obhāsitāni ahesuṃ. Na pavattīti na sandī. Vāto
analyzed: ativiya samujjalāya attano pabhāya obhāsitāni ahesum na na sandī vāto

original: na vāyīti kharo vāto na vāyi, mudusukho pana sattānaṃ sukhāvaho vāyi. Pathavīgatā
analyzed: na vāyi iti kharaḥ vātaḥ na vāyi mudu sukhaḥ pana sattānam sukha āvahaḥ vāyi pathavī gatā

original: ahesuṃ uccaṭṭhāne ṭhātuṃ avisahantā. Utusampannoti anuṇhāsītatāsaṅkhātena utunā sampanno.
analyzed: ahesum ucca ṭṭhāne ṭhātum a visahantāḥ utu sampannaḥ ti anuṇhā sīta tā saṅkhātena utunā sampannaḥ

original: Vāmahatthaṃ ure ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇena puthupāṇinā hatthatāḷanena saddakaraṇaṃ apphoṭanaṃ.
analyzed: vāma hattham ure ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇena puthu pāṇinā hattha tāḷanena sadda karaṇam apphoṭanam

original: Mukhena usseḷanaṃ saddamuñcanaṃ seḷanaṃ. Ekaddhajamālā ahosīti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho.
analyzed: mukhena usseḷanam sadda muñcanam seḷanam ekaddha ja mālā ahosi iti ettha iti saddaḥ ādi attho

original: Tena vicittapupphasugandhapupphavassadevā vassiṃsu, sūriye dibbamāne eva tārakā obhāsiṃsu,
analyzed: tena vicitta puppha sugandha puppha vassadevāḥ vassiṃsu sūriye dibbamāne eva tārakāḥ obhāsiṃsu

original: acchaṃ vippasannaṃ udakaṃ pathavito ubbhijji, bilāsayā darisayā tiracchānā āsayato
analyzed: accham vippasannam udakam pathavitaḥ ubbhijji bilāsayā darisayā tiracchānau āsayataḥ

original: nikkhamiṃsu; rāgadosamohāpi tanu bhaviṃsu, pathaviyaṃ rajo vūpasami, aniṭṭhagandho

original: vigacchi, dibbagandho vāyi, rūpino devā sarūpeneva manussānaṃ āpāthamagamaṃsu, sattānaṃ
