original: olokanamattakampi. Taṃ kammakāraṇanti taṃ pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇaṃ catunnampi
analyzed: tam kamma kāraṇam ti tam pañcavidha bandhana kamma kāraṇam

original: passānaṃ vasena samparivattetvā karontiyeva, pāḷiyaṃ pana ekapassavasena āgatā. Gehassāti
analyzed: passānam vasena samparivattetvā karontiyā iva pāḷiyam pana eka passa vasena āgatā gehassa ati

original: mahato gehassa. Sabbatoti sabbāvayavato. Sampajjalite ekajālībhūte. Supakkuthitāyāti suṭṭhu nipakkāya.
analyzed: mahato gehassa sabbatas ti sabba avayavataḥ sampajjalite ekajālībhūte su pakkuthitāya ati suṭṭhu nipakkāya

original: Vibhattoti tattha nibbattakasattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammunā vibhatto viya nibbatto. Ayopākārena parito atto gahitoti ayopākārapariyatto parikkhitto.
analyzed: vibhattaḥ ti tattha nibbattaka sattānam sādhāraṇa kammunā vibhattaḥ viya nibbattaḥ ayopākārena paritas attaḥ gahito iti ayopākāra pariyattaḥ parikkhitto

original: Yamakagoḷakāti dārakānaṃ kīḷanayugaḷā. Evampi dukkhoti yathāvuttaussadanirayavasenapi sota-ghāna-jivhā-kāya-mano-gocaratāvasenapi iminā ākārena dukkhoti.
analyzed: dārakānam kīḷana yugaḷā evam pi dukkhaḥ ti yathā vutta ossada niraya vasena api sota ghāna jivhā kāya manaḥ gocara tā vasena api iminā ākārena dukkhaḥ ti

original: 251. Dantehi ullehitvāti uttaradantehi añchitvā. Rasavasena atitto assādo rasādo. Tenāha “rasagedhena paribhuttaraso”ti.
analyzed: dantehi ullehitvā ati uttara dantehi añchitvā rasa vasena atittaḥ assādaḥ rasādaḥ tena āha rasa gedhena paribhutta rasaḥ iti

original: 252. Durūpoti virūpo. Duddasoti teneva virūpabhāvena aniṭṭhadassano. Lakuṇṭhakoti
analyzed: durūpaḥ ti virūpaḥ duddasaḥ ti tena iva virūpa bhāvena aniṭṭha dassanaḥ lakuṇṭhako ti

original: rasso. Paviṭṭhagīvoti khandhantaraṃ anupaviṭṭhagīvo. Mahodaroti vipulakucchi. Yebhuyyena
analyzed: rasso paviṭṭha gīvaḥ ti khandhantaram anupaviṭṭha gīvaḥ mahā udaraḥ ti vipula kucchi yebhuyyena

original: hi lakuṇṭakā sattā rassagīvā puthulakucchikāva hontīti tathā vuttaṃ. Kāṇo nāma cakkhuvikaloti
analyzed: hi lakuṇṭakā sattāḥ rassa gīvā puthula kucchikāḥ va honti iti tathā vuttam kāṇaḥ nāma cakkhuvikalo ti

original: vuttaṃ – “ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo vā”ti. Kuṇīti hatthavikalo vuccatīti āha
analyzed: vuttam ekakkhikāṇaḥ vā ubhayakkhikāṇaḥ vā ti kuṇī iti hattha vikalaḥ vuccati iti āha

original: – “ekahatthakuṇī vā ubhayahatthakuṇī vā”ti. Vātādinā upahatakāyapakkho idha pakkhahatoti
analyzed: eka hattha kuṇī vā ubhaya hattha kuṇī vā ati vāta ādinā upahata kāya pakkhaḥ idha pakkha hato ti

original: adhippeto, na pakkhihatoti āha – “pakkhahatoti pīṭhasappī”ti. Dukkhānupabandhadassanatthanti
analyzed: adhippetaḥ na pakkhihato ti āha pakkhahato ti pīṭhasappī iti dukkha an upabandha dassana ttham

original: aparāparajātīsu vipākadukkhassa anupabandhavasena pavattidassanatthaṃ.
analyzed: apara apara jātīsu vipāka dukkhassa an upabandha vasena pavatti dassana ttham

original: Kalīyati khalīyati appahīyati sāsanaṃ etenāti kali, jutaparājayo. So eva gahasadisatāya
analyzed: kalīyati khalīyati appahīyati sāsanam saḥ eva gaha sadisa tāya

original: “kaliggaho”ti vutto. Adhibandhanti kuṭumbassa adhivutthassa mūlabhūtassa attano bandhitabbataṃ.
analyzed: kaliggaho ti vuttaḥ adhibandhanti kuṭumbassa adhivutthassa mūla bhūtassa attanaḥ bandhitabba tam

original: Tenāha “attanāpi bandhaṃ nigaccheyyā”ti. Bālabhūmiyā bālabhāvassa matthakappatti
analyzed: tena āha attanā api bandham nigaccheyya iti bāla bhūmiyā bāla bhāvassa matthaka ppatti

original: nirayagāmikammakāritāti “niraye nibbattati”cceva vuttaṃ. Taggahaṇeneva pana tato
analyzed: niraya gāmi kamma kāri tā ti niraye vuttam tad gahaṇena iva pana tatas

original: mudumudutarādikammavasena sesāpāyesu aparāparanibbattādibālabhūmi vibhāvitā hotīti.
analyzed: mudu mudutara ādi kamma vasena sesa apāyesu apara apara nibbatta ādi bāla bhūmi vibhāvitā hoti iti

original: 253. Vuttānusārenāti “bālo aya”ntiādinā vuttassa atthavacanassa “paṇḍito aya”nti
analyzed: vutta anusārena ati bālaḥ ayanti ādinā vuttassa attha vacanassa paṇḍitaḥ

original: etehi lakkhīyatītiādinā anusārena. Manosucaritādīnaṃ vasenāti cintento anabhijjhā-abyāpāda-sammādassanaṃ
analyzed: etehi lakkhīyati iti ādinā anusārena manaḥ su carita ādīnam vasena ati cintentaḥ anabhijjhā abyāpāda sammādassanam

original: sucintitameva cintetītiādinā manosucaritānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ vasena yojetabbāni.
analyzed: su cintitam eva cintā iti iti ādinā manaḥ su caritānam tiṇṇam su caritānam vasena yojetabbāni

original: Cakkaratanavaṇṇanā
256. Uposathaṃ vuccati aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ sabbadivasesu gahaṭṭhehi rakkhitabbasīlaṃ,
analyzed: uposatham vuccati aṭṭhaṅga samannāgatam sabba divasesu gaha ṭṭhehi rakkhitabba sīlam

original: samādānavasena taṃ etassa atthīti uposathiko, tassa. Tenāha “samādinnauposathaṅgassā”ti.
analyzed: samādāna vasena tat etassa atthi iti uposathiko tassa tena āha samādinna auposathaṅgassa iti

original: Tadāti tasmiṃ kāle, yasmiṃ pana kāle cakkavattibhāvasaṃvattaniya-dāna-sīlādi-puññasambhārasamudāgamasampanno
analyzed: tadā ati tasmin kāle yasmin pana kāle cakkavatti bhāva saṃvattaniya dāna sīla ādi puñña sambhāra samudāgama sampannaḥ

original: pūritacakkavattivatto kādīpadesavisesapaccājātiyā ceva kularūpabhogādhipateyyādiguṇavisesasampattiyā
analyzed: pūrita cakkavatti vatto ca iva kula rūpa bhoga ādhipateyya ādi guṇa visesa sampattiyā

original: ca tadanurūpe attabhāve ṭhito hoti, tasmiṃ kāle. Tādise hi kāle cakkavattibhāvī purisuttamo
analyzed: ca tad anurūpe attabhāve ṭhitaḥ hoti tasmin kāle tādise hi kāle cakkavatti bhāvī purisuttamaḥ

original: yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgato rājā khattiyo hutvā muddhāvasitto visuddhasīlo anuposathaṃ
analyzed: yathāvutta guṇa samannāgataḥ rājā khattiyaḥ hutvā muddhāvasittaḥ visuddha sīlaḥ anuposatham

original: satasahassavissajjanādinā sammāpaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjati, na yadā cakkaratanaṃ uppajjati,
analyzed: sata sahassa vissajjana ādinā sammāpaṭipattim paṭipajjati na yadā cakka ratanam uppajjati

original: tadā eva. Tenāha – “pāto…pe… dhammatā”ti. (Tattha damo indriyasaṃvaro, saṃyamo sīlasaṃvaro.)
analyzed: tadā eva tena āha pātope dhamma tā ti tattha damaḥ indriya saṃvaro saṃyamaḥ sīla saṃvaro

original: Vuttappakārapuññakammapaccayanti cakkavattibhāvāvahadānadamasaṃyamādipuññakammahetukaṃ.
analyzed: vutta ppakāra puñña kamma paccayanti cakkavatti bhāva āvaha dāna dama saṃyama ādi puñña kamma hetukam

original: Nīlamaṇisaṅghāṭasadisanti indanīlamaṇisañcayasamānaṃ. Dibbānubhāvayuttattāti dassanīyatā
analyzed: nīla maṇi saṅghāṭa sadisanti inda nīla maṇi sañcaya samānam dibba anubhāva yutta ttā ati dassanīya tā

original: manuññaghosatā ākāsagāmitā obhāsavissajjanā appaṭighātatā rañño icchitatthanipphattikāraṇatāti
analyzed: manuñña ghosa tā ākāsa gāmi tā obhāsa vissajjanā appaṭighāta tā rañño icchitattha nipphatti kāraṇa tā ati

original: evamādīhi dibbasadisehi ānubhāvehi samannāgatattā. Sabbehi ākārehīti sabbehi sundarehi
analyzed: evamādīhi dibba sadisehi ānubhāvehi samannāgata ttā sabbehi ākārehi iti sabbehi sundarehi

original: ākārehi. Paripūranti paripuṇṇaṃ. Sā cassa pāripūri idāneva vitthārīyati.
analyzed: ākārehi paripūranti paripuṇṇam sā ca ssa pāripūri idānā iva vitthārīyati

original: Panāḷīti chiddaṃ. Suddhasiniddhadantapantiyā nibbivarāyāti adhippāyo. Nābhipanāḷi
analyzed: panāḷi iti chiddam suddha siniddha danta pantiyā nibbivarāya ati adhippāyaḥ nābhipanāḷi

original: parikkhepapaṭṭesūti nābhiparikkhepapaṭṭe ceva nābhiyā panāḷiparikkhepapaṭṭe ca. Suvibhattāvāti
analyzed: parikkhepa paṭṭesu uti nābhi parikkhepa paṭṭe ca iva nābhiyā panāḷi parikkhepa paṭṭe ca

original: aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇattā suṭṭhu vibhattā. Paricchedalekhantaresu maṇikā suvibhattā
analyzed: aññamaññam a saṃkiṇṇattā suṭṭhu vibhattā pariccheda lekha antaresu maṇikā su vibhattā

original: hutvā paññāyantīti vadanti.
analyzed: hutvā paññāyanti iti vadanti

original: Paricchedalekhādīnīti ādi-saddena mālākammādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Surattātiādīsu surattaggahaṇena
analyzed: pariccheda lekhā ādīni iti ādi saddena mālā kamma ādim saṅgaṇhāti su ratta ati ādīsu su ratta ggahaṇena

original: mahānāmavaṇṇataṃ paṭikkhipati, suddhaggahaṇena saṃkiliṭṭhataṃ, siniddhaggahaṇena
analyzed: mahānāma vaṇṇa tam paṭikkhipati suddha ggahaṇena saṃkiliṭṭha tam siniddha ggahaṇena

original: lūkhataṃ. Kāmaṃ tassa cakkaratanassa nemimaṇḍalaṃ asandhikaṃva nibbattaṃ, sabbatthakameva
analyzed: kāmam tassa cakka ratanassa nemi maṇḍalam asandhikam iva nibbattam sabbatthakam eva

original: pana kevalaṃ pavāḷavaṇṇova na sobhatīti pakaticakkassa sandhiyuttesu ṭhānesu rattajambunadaparikkhataṃ
analyzed: pana kevalam pavāḷa vaṇṇā uva na sobhati iti pakati cakkassa sandhi yuttesu ṭhānesu ratta jambu nada parikkhatam

original: ahosi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sandhīsu panassā”tiādi.
analyzed: tam sandhāya vuttam sandhīsu panassa atiādi

original: Nemimaṇḍalapiṭṭhiyanti nemimaṇḍalassa piṭṭhipadese. Dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānamantareti
analyzed: nemi maṇḍala piṭṭhiyanti nemi maṇḍalassa piṭṭhi padese dasannam dasannam antareti

original: dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānaṃ antarasamīpe padese. Chiddamaṇḍalacittoti maṇḍalasaṇṭhānachiddavicitto.
analyzed: antara samīpe padese maṇḍala saṇṭhāna chidda vicittaḥ

original: Sukusalasamannāhatassāti suṭṭhu kusalena sippinā pahatassa, vāditassāti attho. Vaggūti
analyzed: su kusala samannāhatassa ti suṭṭhu kusalena sippinā pahatassa vāditassa ati atthaḥ vaggū iti

original: manoramo rajanīyoti suṇantānaṃ rāguppādako. Kamanīyoti kanto. Samosaritakusumadāmāti
analyzed: manoramaḥ rajanīya uti suṇantānam rāga uppādako kamanīya uti kanto samosarita kusuma dāmā ati

original: olambitasugandhakusumadāmā. Nemiparikkhepassāti nemipariyantaparikkhepassa. Nābhipanāḷiyā
analyzed: olambita sugandha kusuma dāmā nemi parikkhepassa ti nemi pariyanta parikkhepassa nābhi panāḷiyā

original: dvinnaṃ passānaṃ vasena “dvinnampi nābhipanāḷīna”nti vuttaṃ. Ekā eva hi sā panāḷi.
analyzed: dvinnam passānam vasena dvinnam pi nābhi panāḷīnam ti vuttam ekā eva hi sā panāḷi

original: Yehīti yehi dvīhi sīhamukhehi. Puna yehīti muttākalāpehi.
analyzed: yehi iti yehi dvīhi sīhamukhehi puna yehi iti muttā kalāpehi

original: Odhāpayamānanti sotuṃ avahitāni kurumānaṃ. Cando purato, cakkaratanaṃ pacchāti evaṃ pubbāpariyena pubbāparabhāgena.
analyzed: odhāpayamānanti sotum avahitāni kurumānam cando puratas cakka ratanam pacchā ati evam pubbāpariyena pubba apara bhāgena

original: Ante purassāti anurādhapure rañño antepurassa uttarasīhapañjaraāsanne tadā rañño
analyzed: ante purassa ati anurādha pure raññaḥ antepurassa uttara sīha pañjara āsanne tadā raññaḥ

original: pāsāde tādisassa uttaradisāya sīhapañjarassa labbhamānattā vuttaṃ. Sukhena sakkāti
analyzed: pāsāde tādisassa uttara disāya sīha pañjarassa labbhamāna ttā vuttam sukhena sakkā iti

original: kiñci anāruhitvā sarīrañca anullaṅghitvā yathāṭhiteneva hatthena pupphamuṭṭhiyo khipitvā
analyzed: kiñci an āruhitvā sarīrañca an ullaṅghitvā yathā aṭhitena iva hatthena puppha muṭṭhiyaḥ khipitvā

original: sukhena sakkā hoti pūjetuṃ.
analyzed: sukhena sakkā hoti pūjetum

original: Nānāvirāgaratanappabhāsamujjalanti nānāvidhacittavaṇṇaratanobhāsapabhassaraṃ. Ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatteti. Āgantvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato upari ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatte.
analyzed: nānā virāga ratana ppabhāsam ujjalanti nānāvidha citta vaṇṇa ratana ubhāsa pabhassaram ākāsam abbhut gantvā pavatteti āgantvā ṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ upari ākāsam abbhut gantvā pavatte

original: Sannivesakkhamoti khandhavārasannivesayogyo. Sulabhāhārūpakaraṇoti sukheneva laddhabbadhaññagorasadārutiṇādibhojanasādhano. Paracakkanti parassa rañño senā, āṇā vā.
analyzed: sannivesa kkhamaḥ ti khandha vāra sannivesa yogyaḥ sulabha āhāra upakaraṇaḥ ti sukhena iva laddhabba dhañña gorasa dāru tiṇa ādi bhojana sādhano para cakkanti parassa rañño senā āṇā vā

original: Āgatanandanoti āgato hutvā nandijanano. Āgataṃ vā āgamanaṃ, tena nandatīti āgatanandano.
analyzed: āgata nandanaḥ iti āgataḥ hutvā nandi jananaḥ āgatam vai āgamanam tena nandati iti āgata nandanaḥ

original: Gamanena socetīti gamanasocano. Upakappethāti uparūpari kappetha saṃvidahatha, upanethāti
analyzed: gamanena soceti iti gamana socanaḥ upakappetha ati upari upari kappetha saṃvidahatha upanetha ati

original: attho. Upaparikkhitvāti hetutopi sabhāvatopi phalatopi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaādīnavatopi vīmaṃsitvā.
analyzed: atthaḥ upaparikkhitvā ti hetutaḥ pi sabhāvataḥ pi phalataḥ pi diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika ādīnavataḥ pi vīmaṃsitvā

original: Vibhāventi paññāya atthaṃ vibhūtaṃ karontīti vibhāvino, paññavanto. Anuyantāti anuvattakā.
analyzed: vibhāventi paññāya attham vibhūtam karonti iti vibhāvinaḥ paññavantaḥ anuyantā ati anuvattakā

original: Ogacchamānanti osīdantaṃ. Yojanamattanti vitthārato yojanamattaṃ padesaṃ. Gambhīrabhāvena
analyzed: ogacchamānanti osīdantam vitthārataḥ yojana mattam padesam gambhīra bhāvena

original: pana yathā bhūmi dissati, evaṃ ogacchati. Tenāha “mahāsamuddatala”ntiādi. Ante cakkaratanaṃ
analyzed: pana yathā bhūmi dissati evam ogacchati tena āha mahā samudda talanti ādi ante cakka ratanam

original: udakena senāya anajjhottharaṇatthaṃ.
analyzed: udakena senāya an ajjhottharaṇa ttham

original: 257. Puratthimo samuddo pariyanto assāti puratthimasamuddapariyanto, puratthimasamuddaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā. Cāturantāyāti cātusamuddantāya pubbavidehādicatukoṭṭhāsantāya.
analyzed: puratthimaḥ samuddaḥ pariyantaḥ assa ati puratthima samudda pariyantaḥ puratthima samuddam pariyantam katvā cātur antāya ati cātusamudda antāya pubbavideha ādi catu koṭṭhāsa antāya

original: Hatthiratanavaṇṇanā
analyzed: hatthi ratana vaṇṇanā

original: 258. Haricandanādīhīti ādi-saddena catujjātiyagandhādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Āgamanaṃ cintethāti
analyzed: haricandana ādīhi iti ādi saddena catur jātiya gandha ādim saṅgaṇhāti āgamanam cintetha iti

original: vadanti cakkavattivattassa pūritatāya paricitattā. Bhūmiphusanakehi vāladhi, varaṅgaṃ
analyzed: vadanti cakkavatti vattassa pūrita tāya bhūmiphusanakehi vāladhi varaṅgam

original: hatthoti imehi ca tīhi, catūhi pādehi cāti sattahi avayavehi ṭhitattā sattapatiṭṭho.
analyzed: hatthaḥ ti imehi ca tīhi catūhi pādehi ca ati sattahi avayavehi ṭhita ttā satta patiṭṭhaḥ

original: Itaresaṃ amaccādīnaṃ cintayantānaṃ na āgacchati. Apanetvāti attano ānubhāvena apanetvā.
analyzed: itaresam amacca ādīnam cintayantānam na āgacchati apanetvā iti ānubhāvena apanetvā

original: Gandhameva hi tassa itare hatthino na sahanti.
analyzed: gandham eva hi tassa itare hatthinaḥ na sahanti

original: Assaratanavaṇṇanā
analyzed: assa ratana vaṇṇanā

original: Sindhavakulatoti sindhavassājānīyakulato.
analyzed: sindhava kulataḥ ti sindhavassājānīya kulataḥ

original: Maṇiratanavaṇṇanā
Sakaṭanābhisamappamāṇanti pariṇāhato mahāsakaṭassa nābhiyā samappamāṇaṃ. Ubhosu antesūti
analyzed: sakaṭa nābhi samappamāṇam ti pariṇāhataḥ mahā sakaṭassa nābhiyā samappamāṇam ubhosu antesu iti

original: heṭṭhā upari cāti dvīsu antesu. Kaṇṇikapariyantatoti dvinnaṃ kañcanapadumānaṃ kaṇṇikāya
analyzed: heṭṭhā upari ca ati dvīsu antesu dvinnam kañcana padumānam kaṇṇikāya

original: pariyantato. Muttājālake ṭhapetvāti suvisuddhe muttāmaye jālake patiṭṭhapetvā.
analyzed: pariyantataḥ muttā jālake ṭhapetvā ati su visuddhe muttā maye jālake patiṭṭhapetvā

original: Itthiratanavaṇṇanā
analyzed: itthi ratana vaṇṇanā

original: “Itthiratanaṃ pātubhavatī”ti vatvā assa pātubhavanākāraṃ dassetuṃ, “maddarājakulato
analyzed: itthi ratanam pātubhavati iti vatvā assa pātubhavana ākāram dassetum madda rāja kulataḥ

original: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Maddaraṭṭhaṃ kira abhirūpānaṃ itthīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Saṇṭhānapāripūriyāti
analyzed: vā ti ādi vuttam maddaraṭṭham kira abhirūpānam itthīnam uppatti ṭhānam saṇṭhāna pāripūriyā iti

original: hatthapādādisarīrāvayavānaṃ susaṇṭhitatāya. Avayavapāripūriyā hi samudāyapāripūrisiddhi.
analyzed: hattha pāda ādi sarīra avayavānam avayava pāripūriyā hi samudāya pāripūri siddhi

original: Rūpanti sarīraṃ. Dassanīyāti surūpabhāvena passitabbayuttā. Somanassavasena cittaṃ
analyzed: rūpam ti sarīram dassanīyā ati surūpa bhāvena passitabba yuttā somanassa vasena cittam

original: pasādeti yoniso cintentānaṃ kammaphalasaddhāya vasena. Pasādāvahattāti kāraṇavacanena

original: Kammavipākanti akusalakammavipākaṃ. Vemānikapetāti kaṇhasukkavasena missakakammaṃ

original: honti, pavattiyaṃ pana kammānurūpaṃ kadāci puññaphalaṃ, kadāci apuññaphalaṃ paccanubhavanti.

original: Yesaṃ pana ariyamaggo uppajjati, tesaṃ maggādhigamato paṭṭhāya puññaphalameva uppajjatīti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Apuññaphalaṃ pubbe viya kaṭukaṃ na hoti. Manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ mudukameva

original: veditabbo. Dvāresūti avīcimahānarakassa catūsu dvāresu.
analyzed: veditabbaḥ dvāresu iti avīci mahānarakassa catūsu dvāresu

original: Jātidhammoti kammakilesavasena jātipakatiko. Tenāha “jātisabhāvo”ti. Sabhāvo ca nāma tejodhātuyā uṇhatā viya na kadācipi vigacchatīti āha “aparimutto jātiyā”tiādi.

original: 263. Idāni jātiyā devadūtabhāvaṃ niddhāretvā dassetuṃ, “daharakumāro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: idāni jātiyāḥ deva dūta bhāvam niddhāretvā dassetum dahara kumāra itiādi vuttaṃ

original: Atthato evaṃ vadati nāmāti vācāya avadantopi atthāpattito evaṃ vadanto viya hoti

analyzed: payogaḥ icchitabbo anāgatāya na icchitabbo ti āha jāti āgamissati iti tena iva āha

original: Vividhaṃ dukkhaṃ ādahatīti byādhi, visesena vā ādhīyati etenāti byādhi, tena byādhinā. Abhihatoti bādhito, upaddutoti attho.
analyzed: vividham dukkham ādahati iti byādhi visesena vā ādhīyati etena ati byādhi tena byādhinā abhihataḥ ti bādhitaḥ upadduto ti attho

original: 265. Kāraṇā nāma “hatthacchedādibhedā adhikapīḷā karīyati etāyā”ti katvā yātanā, sā eva kāraṇikehi kātabbaṭṭhena kammanti kammakāraṇā yātanākammanti attho.
analyzed: kāraṇā nāma hattha cheda ādi bhedā adhika pīḍā etāya ati katvā yātanā sā eva kāraṇikehi kātabba ṭṭhena kammanti kamma kāraṇā yātanā kammanti attho

original: 266. Bahuṃ pāpaṃ katanti bahuso pāpaṃ kataṃ. Tena pāpassa bahulīkaraṇamāha. Bahūti
analyzed: bahum pāpam katanti bahuso pāpam katam tena pāpassa bahulīkaraṇam āha bahu iti

original: upamāya vibhāvetuṃ, “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kattabbamevāti daṇḍameva. Anuvijjitvā

original: vīmaṃsitvā. Vinicchayaṭṭhānanti aṭṭakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Parittapāpakammāti dubbalapāpakammā.

original: attano dhammatāyapi saranti.

analyzed: attano pūjita paṭam pañcahi pi na sarati iti balavatā pāpa kammena byāmohitaḥ

original: pañca saññāṇāni na gaṇhāti. Tuṇhī hoti kammāraho ayanti tattha patīkāraṃ apassanto.
analyzed: pañca saññāṇāni na gaṇhāti tuṇhī hoti kamma ārahaḥ ayanti tattha patīkāram a passanto

original: 267. Avīcimahānirayo ubbedhenapi yojanasatamevāti vadanti. Navanavayojanikā hoti

analyzed: sabbassa parikkhepato dasa yojana sahassam hoti iti vuttam

original: 268. Jhāyatīti paṭipākatikaṃ hoti. Tādisamevāti purimasadisattā “ubbhataṃ sadisameva hotī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Bahusampattoti vā bahuṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā puratthimadvāraṃ sampatto hoti.

original: Channaṃ jālānanti catūhi disāhi heṭṭhā upari ca ubbhatānaṃ channaṃ jālānaṃ. Sattānaṃ

original: nirantaratā nirayasaṃvattaniyakammakatānañca bahubhāvato jālānaṃ tāva sattānañca

original: 269. Eko pādo mahāniraye hoti, eko gūthaniraye nipatati, kammavegukkhitto antarā padamāvahati sesārambhatāya. Hatthigīvappamāṇā pariṇāhena. Ekadoṇikanāvāppamāṇā āyāmena.

original: Pokkharapattānīti khuradhārāsadisāni tikhiṇaggāni ayosūlamayāneva padumapattāni.

original: Sabbadukkhātikkantā nāmāti sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkantā eva honti carimacittanirodhena vaṭṭadukkhalesassapi asambhavato.

Niṭṭhitā ca suññatavaggavaṇṇanā.

original: “Abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā vuttaṃ nīvaraṇappahānaṃ. Parikammanti kasiṇādiparikammaṃ.

original: Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena aṭṭhatiṃsa kammaṭṭhānāni. Visuddhipaṭipāṭiyā yāva āsavakkhayā

original: imaṃ paṭipattiṃ ekadesena likhi. Soḷasavidhanti soḷasavidhabhāvanāya payogaṃ.
analyzed: imam paṭipattim eka desena soḷasavidha anti soḷasavidha bhāvanāya payogam

original: Kilañjamayeti nānāvidhabhittivibhatte saṇhasukhumaratanaparisibbite kilañjamayasamugge.
analyzed: kilañja maya iti nānāvidha bhitti vibhatte saṇha sukhuma ratana parisibbite kilañja maya samugge

original: Bahi vatthena veṭhetvāti paṭhamaṃ sukhumakambalena veṭhetvā paṭipāṭiyā tettiṃsāya

original: samuggesu pakkhipitvā tato bahi sukhumavatthena veṭhetvā chādetvā. Tiṇagacchapahānasammajjanādinā
analyzed: samuggesu pakkhipitvā tatas bahi sukhuma vatthena veṭhetvā chādetvā tiṇa gaccha pahāna sammajjana ādinā

original: sodhitamattakameva hotu, kadalipuṇṇaghaṭaṭhapanadhajapaṭākussāpanādialaṅkaraṇena

analyzed: attho antarabhogikānam ti anuyutta rāja mahāmattānam javana dūta iti khippam gacchantaka dūta purise

original: Tāḷehi saha avacarantīti tāḷāvacarā.
analyzed: tāḷehi saha avacaranti iti tāḷāvacarā

analyzed: ṭhapetvā sayam nīca āsane nisinnaḥ na ayam aññassa ratanassa bhavissati iti ayam parihāro

original: ghaṭe dīpo viya abbhantare eva samujjalamānaparipakkatihetukabhāvato.
analyzed: ghaṭe dīpaḥ viya abbhantare eva

original: Dhāremīti icchāmi, gaṇhāmīti attho. Dvejjhavacananti dveḷhakabhāvo. Antaraṃ karotīti
analyzed: dhāremi iti icchāmi gaṇhāmi iti atthaḥ dvejjha vacananti dveḷhaka bhāvaḥ antaram karoti iti

analyzed: dvinnam pādānam antaram tam lekham karoti ekena pādena atikkamīti attho tassāḥ gata maggena ati

analyzed: paṇṇa chattakanti tāla patta muṭṭhim

analyzed: manasi katvā tad ninna bhāvena gacchantaḥ pucchissāmi iti pi cittam na uppādesi ettha

analyzed: tattha ca vihārassa bahu bhāvataḥ satthā kaham vasati iti pucchi satthu ekakassa iva nikkhamanam

original: “nanu ca bhagavā”tiādi.
analyzed: nanu ca bhagavān ati ādi

original: Uruddhanti visālanti keci. Atirekatiyojanasatantiādinā anvayato byatirekato ca maccheravinayane
analyzed: anvayataḥ ca

analyzed: kula puttassa api dhamma gāravam saṃsandati sameti iti dasseti tena bhagavataḥ katassa

original: saṅgaho kātabboti dasseti.
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ kātabbaḥ iti dasseti

original: Brahmalokappamāṇanti uccabhāvena. Ānubhāvenāti iddhānubhāvena yathā so sotapathaṃ

original: Amanāpo hoti passantānaṃ. Sīhaseyyāya nipannassapi hi ekacce sarīrāvayavā adhokhittavikkhittā

original: Na patiṭṭhātīti nappavattati, “kaṃsi tva”ntiādinā apucchite kathāpavatti eva na hoti.
analyzed: na patiṭṭhāti iti na pavattati kaṃsi tvanti ādinā a pucchite kathā pavatti eva na hoti

original: Appatiṭṭhitāya kathāya na sañjāyatīti tathā pana pucchāvasena kathāya appavattitāya
analyzed: a patiṭṭhitāya kathāya na sañjāyati iti tathā pana pucchā vasena kathāya appavatti tāya

original: upari dhammakathā na sañjāyati na uppajjati. Itīti tasmā. Kathāpatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ
analyzed: upari dhamma kathā na sañjāyati na uppajjati iti iti tasmā kathā patiṭṭhāpana tham

original: kathāpavattanatthaṃ kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ vā pucchi.
analyzed: kathā pavattana attham kathā samuṭṭhāpana attham vā pucchi

original: Sabhāvameva kathetīti attano bhagavato adiṭṭhapubbattā “adiṭṭhapubbakaṃ kathamahaṃ
analyzed: sabhāvam eva katheti iti attanaḥ bhagavataḥ a diṭṭha pubba ttā a diṭṭha pubbakam katham aham

analyzed: jāneyyanti sa bhāvam eva kevalam attanaḥ ajjhāsayam eva katheti na pana sa devakassa

analyzed: lokassa su pākaṭam sabhāva siddham buddha rūpa kāya sabhāvam atha vā sabhāvam eva katheti iti

analyzed: kathā iti appavikkhambhanti adhippāyaḥ tena āha tathā hi nanti ādi vipassanā lakkhaṇam eva

analyzed: paṭipadanti adhippāyo

original: 343. “Pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ akathetvā”ti vatvā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya akathane kāraṇaṃ

analyzed: pubba bhāga paṭipadam ca sarūpataḥ dassetum yassa hi itiādi vuttam aparisuddhāya api

analyzed: pubbabhāga paṭipadāya vipassanā tathā na kicca kārī pagā iva a vijjamānāya ati yassa

original: hi…pe… aparisuddhā hoti”cceva vuttaṃ. Pubbabhāgapaṭipadā ca nāma saṅkhepato pannarasa
analyzed: hipe aparisuddhā ho ticca iva vuttam pubbabhāga paṭipadā ca nāma saṅkhepato pannarasa

original: Dhātuyo paramatthato vijjamānā, paññattimattho puriso avijjamāno. Atha kasmā bhagavā

analyzed: a vijjamānam dasseti katthaci itthi rūpam bhikkhave purisassa cittam pariyādāya

analyzed: tiṭṭhati itiādīsu a vijjamānena vijjamānam dasseti katthaci cakkhu viññāṇam sota viññāṇam tiādīsu

original: vijjamānena vijjamānaṃ dasseti. Katthaci – “khattiyakumāro brāhmaṇakaññāya saddhiṃ
analyzed: vijjamānena vijjamānam dasseti katthaci khattiya kumāraḥ brāhmaṇa kaññāya saddhim

original: saṃvāsaṃ kappetī”tiādīsu avijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dasseti. Idha pana vijjamānena
analyzed: saṃvāsam kappeti iti ādīsu a vijjamānena a vijjamānam dasseti idha pana vijjamānena

analyzed: avijjamānam dasseti cha dhāturo ti hi samāsa atthaḥ avijjamānaḥ puggala visaya ttā tassa

analyzed: padassa avayava ttho pana appadhāna ttho vijjamāno saḥ sadda kkamena appadhānaḥ api attha kkamena

original: padhānoti āha – “vijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dassento”ti. Puggalādhiṭṭhānāyettha desanāya
analyzed: padhānaḥ iti āha vijjamānena avijjamānam dassento ti puggala adhiṭṭhānāya ittha desanāya

original: cittaṃ niveseyya tathā sañjāneyya, evaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyāti attho. Sandehaṃ kareyyāti
analyzed: cittam niveseyya tathā sañjāneyya evam dhammam deseyya ati attho sandeham kareyya ati

original: asati purise ko karoti? Ko paṭisaṃvedeti, dhātuyo evāti kiṃ nu kho idaṃ, kathaṃ nu
analyzed: asati purise kaḥ karoti kaḥ paṭisaṃvedeti dhātuyo eva ati kim nu kho idam katham nu

analyzed: kho idam ti saṃsayam uppādeyya sammoham āpajjeyya ati catur aṅga samannāgate andhakāre

original: desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Evamāhāti evaṃ “chadhāturo”ti āha.
analyzed: desanam sampaṭicchitum na sakkuṇeyya evam āha ati evam āha

original: Yaṃ tvaṃ purisoti sañjānāsīti yaṃ rūpārūpadhammasamūhaṃ pabandhavasena pavattamānaṃ

original: adhiṭṭhānavisesavisiṭṭhaṃ – “puriso satto itthī”tiādinā tvaṃ sañjānāsi, so chadhāturo.

original: Santesupi chadhātuvinimuttesu dhātvantaresu sukhāvaggahaṇatthaṃ tathā vuttaṃ taggahaṇeneva
analyzed: santesu pi cha dhātu vinimuttesu dhātu antaresu sukha avaggahaṇa attham tathā vuttam tad gahaṇena iva

original: ca tesaṃ gahetabbato, svāyamattho heṭṭhā dassito eva. Sesapadesūti “chaphassāyatano”tiādipadesupi.
analyzed: ca tesam gahetabbato svāyam atthaḥ heṭṭhā dassitaḥ eva sesa padesu iti cha phassa āyatana uti ādi padesu pi

original: Cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni catasso patiṭṭhā etassāti caturādhiṭṭhāno, adhitiṭṭhati patiṭṭhahati

original: etenāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ, yesu patiṭṭhāya uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ adhigacchati, tesaṃ paññādīnaṃ

original: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenāha “svāyaṃ bhikkhū”tiādi. Ettoti vaṭṭato. Vivaṭṭitvāti vinivaṭṭitvā
analyzed: etam adhivacanam tena āha su ayam bhikkhu iti ādi ettas ti vaṭṭataḥ vivaṭṭitvā ati vinivaṭṭitvā

original: apasakkitvā. Ettoti vā etehi chadhātuādīhi. Ettha hi niviṭṭhassa āyattassa uttamāya
analyzed: apasakkitvā ettas ti vā etehi cha dhātu ādīhi ettha hi niviṭṭhassa āyattassa uttamāya

original: siddhiyā asambhavoti. Patiṭṭhitanti ariyamaggādhigamavasena suppatiṭṭhitaṃ. Evañhi
analyzed: siddhiyā patiṭṭhitanti ariya magga adhigama vasena evam hi

original: sabbaso paṭipakkhasamucchindanena tattha patiṭṭhito hoti. Maññassavā nappavattantīti
analyzed: sabbaso paṭipakkha samucchindanena tattha patiṭṭhito hoti maññassavāḥ na ppavattanti iti

original: chahipi dvārehi pavattamānasotāya maggena visositāya sabbaso vigatāya sabbaso vicchedappattiyā
analyzed: chahi pi dvārehi pavatta māna sotāya maggena visositāya sabbasas vigatāya sabbasas viccheda ppattiyā

original: na sandanti. Tenāha “nappavattantī”ti. Yasmā māne sabbaso samucchinne asamucchinno
analyzed: na sandanti tena āha na ppavattanti iti yasmā māne sabbaso samucchinne asamucchinnaḥ

original: anupasanto kileso nāma natthi, tasmā āha – “muni santoti vuccatī”ti rāgaggiādīnaṃ nibbānena nibbuto.

original: svāyaṃ dānaguṇo vessantaramahāraññā kathetabboti.
analyzed: svā ayam dāna guṇaḥ vessantara mahāraññā kathetabbo ti

original: Uddharatīti bahulaṃ katapāpakammavasena laddhavinipātato uddharati. Tasmā natthi mayhaṃ kiñci cittassa aññathattanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: uddharati iti bahulam kata pāpa kamma vasena laddha vinipātataḥ uddharati tasmā natthi mayham kiñci cittassa aññathattan ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Petadakkhiṇanti pete uddissa dātabbadakkhiṇaṃ. Pāpitakāleyevāti, “idaṃ dānaṃ asukassa
analyzed: peta dakkhiṇam ti pete uddissa dātabba dakkhiṇam idam dānam asukassa

original: petassa hotū”ti uddisanavasena patte pāpitakāleyeva. Assāti petassa. Pāpuṇīti phalasamāpattiyā

original: vasena pāpuṇi. Ayañhi pete uddissa dāne dhammatā.
analyzed: vasena pāpuṇi ayam hi pete uddissa dāne dhamma tā

original: Tadā kosalarañño pariccāgavasena ativiya uḷārajjhāsayataṃ, buddhappamukhassa ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ukkaṃsagataguṇavisiṭṭhataṃ sandhāyāha, “asadisadānaṃ kathetabba”nti.
analyzed: tadā kosala rañño pariccāga vasena ativiya uḷāra jjhāsaya tam buddha ppamukhassa ca bhikkhu saṅghassa ukkaṃsa gata guṇa visiṭṭha tam sandhāya āha asadisa dānam kathetabbam ti

original: Asārampi khettanti sārahīnaṃ dukkhettaṃ. Samayeti kasanārahe kāle. Paṃsuṃ apanetvāti

analyzed: nissāram paṃsum nīharitvā sāra bījāni iti sabhāvataḥ abhisaṅkhārataḥ ca sāra bhūtāni bījāni

original: Yadi evaṃ tena katakammaṃ kammalakkhaṇappattaṃ hotīti āha “khīṇāsavenā”tiādi. Tenevāha

analyzed: adhippāyaḥ assa ati khīṇāsavassa dānam

original: heṭṭhā nicchitattā ca, tasmā ubhayenapi dāyakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhi eva coditā. Sā

original: hi idha sādhāraṇavasena nicchitattā saṃsayavatthu. Tenāha – “sammāsambuddhena…pe…

original: vadantī”ti. Sammāsambuddhaṃ hītiādi yathāvuttaatthassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Añño dānassa

analyzed: imāḥ catasso sampadā sabba sādhāraṇa vasena vuttāḥ na yathā adhigata puggala vasena tena āha

original: 386. Idhalokanti ettha saṅkhāralokavisayoti adhippāyena, “vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā”tiādi

original: pana idhaloko paralokoti vibhāgena vinā pañcavokārabhavo gahito; tathā tatiyavāre

original: Yesaṃ pana “idhaloka”nti iminā sattalokassapi gahaṇaṃ icchitaṃ. Tesaṃ matena, “manussalokaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti yojanā.

original: camme laggāpento cammapaṭibaddhaṃ karonto. Cammaṃ baddhaṃ katvāti vivarakāle na phālento

analyzed: abbhantara bhūta kilesam eva

original: 405. Tajjaṃ vāyāmanti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi purisena kuṭhārinā chejjaṃ

original: hotīti “niddosa”nti vuttaṃ. Katvāti ca padaṃ, “kalyāṇaṃ katvā bhaddakaṃ katvā”ti

original: purimapadadvayenapi yojetabbaṃ. Desanākāro hi idha kalyāṇasaddena gahito. Tenevāha
analyzed: purima pada dvayena api yojetabbam desanā kāraḥ hi idha kalyāṇa saddena gahito tena iva āha

analyzed: tad bidhuḥ upekkhā yuttānam saṅgahita ttā paṭhama naye saṃkilesam vaṭṭati nikkilesam

original: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamanaye hi puthujjanassa adhippetattā saṃkilesakilesavippayuttampi
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti vuttam paṭhama naye hi puthujjanassa adhippeta ttā saṃkilesa kilesa vippayuttam pi

original: yujjati. Dutiyanaye pana “so…pe… aḍḍīyatī”tiādivacanato “paṭhamaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
analyzed: yujjati dutiya naye pana sope aḍḍīyati iti ādi vacanataḥ paṭhamam saṃkilesam vaṭṭati iti

original: vuttaṃ. Sekkhassa adhippetattā cassa appahīnakilesavasena, “saṃkilesampi vaṭṭatī”ti
analyzed: vuttam sekkhassa adhippeta ttā ca ssa appahīna kilesa vasena saṃkilesam pi vaṭṭati iti

original: vuttaṃ. Tatiyanaye arahato adhippetattā, “tatiyaṃ nikkilesameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam tatiya naye arahataḥ adhippeta ttā tatiyam nikkilesam eva vaṭṭati iti vuttam

original: Sekkhavāre pana “cakkhumā puriso”tiādikā upamā ekameva atthaṃ ñāpetuṃ āha. Tasmā
analyzed: sekkha vāre pana cakkhumā purisaḥ ti ādikā upamā ekam eva attham ñāpetum āha tasmā

original: cakkhudvārassa uppanne rāgādike vikkhambhetvā vipassanupekkhāya patiṭṭhānaṃ ariyā
analyzed: cakkhu dvārassa uppanne rāga ādike vikkhambhetvā vipassanā upekkhāya patiṭṭhānam ariyā

original: indriyabhāvanāti. Paṭhamanayo vipassakavasena āgato, dutiyo sekkhassa vasena, paṭhamadutiyo
analyzed: indriya bhāvanā ti paṭhama nayaḥ vipassaka vasena āgataḥ dutiyaḥ sekkhassa vasena paṭhama dutiyaḥ

original: ca sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ mūlakammaṭṭhānavasena, tatiyo khīṇāsavassa ariyavihāravasena
analyzed: ca sekkha puthujjanānam mūla kammaṭṭhāna vasena tatiyo khīṇāsavassa ariya vihāra vasena

original: āgato. Paṭhamanaye ca puthujjanassa vasena, dutiyanaye sekkhassa vasena kusalaṃ vuttaṃ,
analyzed: āgataḥ paṭhama naye ca puthujjanassa vasena dutiya naye sekkhassa vasena kusalam vuttaṃ

original: tatiyanaye asekkhassa vasena kiriyābyākataṃ vuttanti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
analyzed: tatiya naye asekkhassa vasena kiriyā byākatam vuttanti ayam visesaḥ veditabbo

original: Papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: papañcasūdaniyā majjhima nikāya ṭṭhakathāya

original: Indriyabhāvanāsuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: indriya bhāvanā sutta vaṇṇanāya līnattha ppakāsanā samattā

original: Niṭṭhitā ca saḷāyatanavaggavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā ca saḷāyatana vagga vaṇṇanā

original: Uparipaṇṇāsaṭīkā samattā.
analyzed: upari paṇṇā sa ṭīkā samattā
